S06bsu030_u:7: ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhamardhatrayodaśabhirbhikṣuśataiḥ,
S06bsu030_u:9: tena khalu punaḥ samayena bhagavānanekaśatasahasrayā parṣadā parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto dharmaṃ deśayati sma //
S06bsu030_u:10: atha khalu tasyāmeva parṣadi suvikrāntavikrāmī nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saṃnipatito 'bhūtsaṃniṣaṇṇaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:11_0: sa utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya
S06bsu030_u:11_1: yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat - pṛccheyamahaṃ bhagavantaṃ
S06bsu030_u:13: evamukte bhagavān suvikrāntavikrāmiṇaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - pṛccha tvaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmiṃstathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ yadyadevākāṅkṣasi /
S06bsu030_u:16: evamukte suvikrāntavikrāmī bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - prajñāpāramitā prajñāpāramiteti bhagavannucyate /
S06bsu030_u:17: kiyatā bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitā prajñāpāramitetyucyate?
S06bsu030_u:18: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati?
S06bsu030_u:19: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitābhāvanā paripūriṃ gacchati?
S06bsu030_u:20: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayato māraḥ pāpīyānavatāraṃ (na)
S06bsu030_u:22: kīdṛgrūpaiśva bhagavan prajñāpāramitāvihārairviharan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣipraṃ sarvajñatādharmaparipūrimadhigacchati?
S06bsu030_u:23: evamukte bhagavān suvikrāntavikrāmiṇaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - sādhu sādhu suvikrāntavikrāmin,
S06bsu030_u:24: yastvaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ paripṛcchasi bodhisattvānāṃ (Vaidya 2)
S06bsu030_u:26: yathāpi nāma tvaṃ bahujanahitāya pratipanno bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca,
S06bsu030_u:27: etarhyanāgatānāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmālokaṃ kartukāma iti //
S06bsu030_u:28: atha khalu bhagavān jānanneva suvikrāntavikrāmiṇaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ paripṛcchati sma - kiṃ tvaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin arthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyaṃstathāgatametadarthaṃ paripṛcchasi?
S06bsu030_u:29_0: evamukte suvikrāntavikrāmī bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - sarvasattvānāṃ
S06bsu030_u:29_1: vayaṃ bhagavannarthāya tathāgatametamarthaṃ paripṛcchāmaḥ sarvasattvahitāya sarvasattvānukampāyai /
S06bsu030_u:33: tatra ye sattvā niyatāḥ śrāvakayāne bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu030_u:41: sarvasattvānāṃ ca bhagavan kuśalamūlasaṃjananaṃ kṛtaṃ bhaviṣyati tathāgatena imaṃ prajñāpāramitāpraśnaṃ visarjayatā /
S06bsu030_u:42: na ca vayaṃ bhagavan hīnādhimuktikānāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛtaśastathāgataṃ paripṛcchāmaḥ,
S06bsu030_u:72: na vayaṃ bhagavan evaṃrūpāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛtaśastathāgataṃ paripṛcchāmaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:77_0: teṣāṃ nihatamānānāṃ vayaṃ bhagavaṃśchinnaviṣāṇavṛṣabhopamānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmāvrīḍhaśalyānāṃ
S06bsu030_u:78: ye dharmamapi nopalabhante nābhiniviśante kutaḥ punaradharmam,
S06bsu030_u:79_0: teṣāṃ vayaṃ bhagavannarthāya tathāgataṃ paripṛcchāmo bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmāśayaśuddhānāmaśaṭhānāmamāyāvināmṛjukānāṃ
S06bsu030_u:81: (teṣāṃ) vayaṃ bhagavan sattvānāṃ kṛtaśastathāgataṃ paripṛcchāmo bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām /
S06bsu030_u:82: ye te bhagavan sattvā bodhijñānamapi na manyante nābhiniviśante nādhyavasāya tiṣṭhanti,
S06bsu030_u:84: teṣāṃ vayaṃ bhagavan sattvānāṃ kṛtaśastathāgataṃ paripṛcchāmo bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ ca /
S06bsu030_u:85: sarvasattvānāṃ vayaṃ bhagavannarthāya hitāya sukhāya yogakṣemāya tathāgataṃ paripṛcchāmaḥ,
S06bsu030_u:86: sarvasattvānāṃ vayaṃ bhagavan sukhamupasaṃhartukāmā anuttarasukhaṃ niruttarasukhaṃ nirvāṇasukhaṃ buddhasukhamasaṃskṛtasukham /
S06bsu030_u:87: tena vayaṃ bhagavan sarvasattvānāṃ saṃśayacchittyarthaṃ tathāgataṃ paripṛcchāmaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:89: niḥsaṃśayāśca bhagavan sarvasattvebhyaḥ saṃśayaprahāṇāya dharmaṃ deśayitukāmāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:93: na ca vayaṃ bhagavan sarvasattvānāṃ kiṃcidanyatsukhaṃ samanupaśyāmo 'nyatra prajñātaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:94: na cānyatkiṃcidbhagavan sarvasattvānāṃ sukhamasti anyatra bodhisattvayānānmahāyānāt /
S06bsu030_u:95: tena vayaṃ bhagavan imamarthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyantaḥ sattvānāṃ sukhamupasaṃhartukāmāḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ paripṛcchāmaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:96: bodhisattvānāṃ caitamarthaṃ bhagavan samanupaśyadbhirasmābhistathāgata etamarthaṃ paripṛṣṭaḥ //
S06bsu030_u:97: evamukte bhagavām suvikrāntavikrāmiṇaṃ bodhisattvāṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - sādhu sādhu suvikrāntavikrāmin /
S06bsu030_u:99: yastvaṃ tathāgataṃ mahato janakāyasyānukampayā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ paripṛcchasi /
S06bsu030_u:103: sādhu bhagavanniti suvikrāntavikrāmī bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt ////
S06bsu030_u:104: bhagavānetadavocat - yattvaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin evaṃ vadasi - prajñāpāramitā prajñāpāramiteti bhagavannucyate,
S06bsu030_u:105: kiyatā bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitetyucyata iti,
S06bsu030_u:106: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin kenaciddharmeṇa prajñāpāramitā vacanīyā /
S06bsu030_u:108: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñāpāramitā śakyate vaktum - iyaṃ sā prajñāpāramitā,
S06bsu030_u:151: na tu tatra kiṃcidajñānaṃ yacchakyamādarśayitum - idaṃ tajjñānam,
S06bsu030_u:168: yena jñānenāsau jñānināṃ jñānīti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati /
S06bsu030_u:178: kaḥ punarvādo yo lokān samanuttariṣyati lokottarayā prajñayā?
S06bsu030_u:188: aṇurapi tatra dharmo na saṃvidyate ya uttartavyo yena cottartavyaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:190: lokottare hi na loko vidyate na lokottaram,
S06bsu030_u:196: na hi yā lokottarā sā vacanīyā, uttīrṇā sā /
S06bsu030_u:203: prajñapyeta - iyaṃ sā prajñā yā nirvidhyatīti /
S06bsu030_u:211: nirvidhyati nirvedhikā prajñetyucyate nirvidhyati na kvaciddhāvati,
S06bsu030_u:215: api tu suvikrāntavikrāmin nirvedhikā prajñeti kiṃ nirvidhyati?
S06bsu030_u:225: yaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin evaṃrūpayā prajñayā samanvāgato vidhyati,
S06bsu030_u:237: sa evaṃ nairvedhikyā prajñyā samanvāgato yatkiṃcitpaśyati śṛṇoti jighrati āsvādayati spṛśati vijānīte vā,
S06bsu030_u:240: anityato duḥkhato gaṇḍato rogataḥ śalyataḥ śūnyato aghata āghātataḥ parataḥ (pralopataḥ)
S06bsu030_u:243: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin viśalyā nāma bhaiṣajyajātiḥ /
S06bsu030_u:244: sā yasmin sthāpyate tataḥ sarvaśalyānyapanayati nirvidhyati,
S06bsu030_u:245: evameva evaṃrūpairdharmaiḥ samanvāgato bhikṣurviśalyaḥ śītībhūto nairvedhikyā prajñayā samanvāgataḥ saṃsārātyantavihārī nairvedhikaprajñoviraktaḥ sarvatraidhātukāt,
S06bsu030_u:247: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin vajraṃ yasminneva nikṣipyate nirvedhanārtham,
S06bsu030_u:252: sa nairvedhikyā prajñayā samanvāgato lokottarayā samyagduḥkhakṣayagāminyānuliptastravidya ityucyate /
S06bsu030_u:255_0: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin vaidyaḥ paṇḍito vyakto medhāvī tantraupayikayā
S06bsu030_u:255_1: mīmāṃsayā samanvāgataḥ syāt sarvabhaiṣajyakuśalaḥ sarvavyādhyutpattikuśalaḥ sarvaduḥkhapramocanakaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:256: sa yaṃ yameva glānaṃ cikitsati taṃ tameva mocayat /
S06bsu030_u:258: tathā hi sa sarvabhaiṣajyakuśalaḥ sarvavyādhyutpattikuśalaḥ sarvarogavimocanakaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:259: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin tṛtīyā vidyā sarvāvidyopaśamāya saṃvartate,
S06bsu030_u:263: idaṃ ca me suvikrāntavikrāmin saṃghāya bhāṣitam -
S06bsu030_u:264: prajñā śreṣṭhā hi lokasya yeyaṃ nirvedhagāminī /
S06bsu030_u:283: na tasya yaḥ svabhāvaḥ sa svayaṃ saṃbhavaḥ,
S06bsu030_u:290: evaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin yaḥ samudayāstaṃgamaprativedhaḥ anutpādāya anirodhāya,
S06bsu030_u:295: tameva pratītya sa dharmo na saṃvidyate /
S06bsu030_u:297: saiṣā suvikrāntavikrāmin pratītyasamutpādasya parijñā yathābhūtatā anutpādena sūcyate /
S06bsu030_u:307: sa nātīto na anāgato na pratyutpannaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:318: tena niruddhā eva sarvadharmā jñātā dṛṣṭāḥ pratividdhāḥ sākṣātkṛtāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:329: na hi ajñānaṃ kṣayo vā akṣayo vā /
S06bsu030_u:342: api tu nirdeśa eṣaḥ ajñānakṣaya iti vā kṣaya(jñāna)miti /
S06bsu030_u:343: iyaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin akṣayakṣayajñānaparīkṣā sarvadharmāṇāṃ yenāvabuddhā sa kṣayajñānavigataḥ,
S06bsu030_u:350: anirdeśyo hi nirvāṇadhātuḥ sarvanirdeśasamatikrāntaḥ sarvanirdeśasamucchinno nirvāṇadhātuḥ /
S06bsu030_u:353: na ca suvikrāntavikrāmin nirvāṇadhāturdeśastho na pradeśasthaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:357: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñāpāramitāyāḥ kiṃcidāraṃ vā pāraṃ vā /
S06bsu030_u:358: sacetsuvikrāntavikrāmin prajñāpāramitāyā āraṃ vā pāraṃ vā upalabhyeta,
S06bsu030_u:359: nirdiśettathāgataḥ prajñāyā āraṃ vā pāraṃ vā /
S06bsu030_u:362: api tu suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñāpāramiteti pārametatsarvadharmāṇāṃ jñānakarmaṇām,
S06bsu030_u:365: na hi vācā na karmaṇā prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:379: na ca suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhau bodhiḥ saṃvidyate /
S06bsu030_u:383: na ca punardharmo dharmasvabhāvena saṃvidyate anenānubodhena /
S06bsu030_u:388: na ca tathāgatena bodhirjñātā na janitā /
S06bsu030_u:391: na ca bodhau kaścitsattvo vā sattvaprajñaptirvā /
S06bsu030_u:424: yena ca anubuddhā pratibuddhā avikalpā kalpasamucchedāya,
S06bsu030_u:449: idaṃ ca me saṃdhāya bhāṣitam - na sattvadhātorūnatvaṃ vā pūrṇatvaṃ vā prajñāyate /
S06bsu030_u:453: yathā ca sattvadhātornonatvaṃ na pūrṇatvaṃ prajñāyate,
S06bsu030_u:454: evaṃ sarvadharmāṇāmapi nonatvaṃ na pūrṇatvaṃ prajñāyate /
S06bsu030_u:459: iyaṃ ca mayā saṃdhāya vāgbhāṣitā - yathā sattvadhātornonatvaṃ na pūrṇatvaṃ prajñāyate,
S06bsu030_u:460: evaṃ sarvadharmāṇāmapi nonatvaṃ na pūrṇatvaṃ prajñāyata iti /
S06bsu030_u:467: na hi buddhadharmāḥ kenacicchakyā ūnā vā pūrṇā vā kartum /
S06bsu030_u:471: tatra na kasyaciddharmasya ūnatvaṃ vā pūrṇatvaṃ vā /
S06bsu030_u:473: na ca dharmadhātorūnatvaṃ vā pūrṇatvaṃ vā /
S06bsu030_u:477: nāpi sattvadhātorvā dharmadhātorvā ūnatvaṃ vā pūrṇatvaṃ vopalabhyate vā saṃvidyate vā /
S06bsu030_u:480: tenocyate - na buddhadharmāṇāmūnatvaṃ vā pūrṇatvaṃ vā prajñāyata iti /
S06bsu030_u:482: na tatra śakyaṃ kenacidutkṣeptuṃ vā prakṣeptuṃ vā /
S06bsu030_u:494: yo hi kaścit suvikrāntavikrāmin imān dharmānaprajānannanavabudhyamāno bodhisattva ityātmānaṃ pratijānīte,
S06bsu030_u:511: viparyastāḥ punaḥ sattvāḥ svacaryāṃ svaviṣayaṃ svagocaraṃ na prajānanti /
S06bsu030_u:522: na bodhisattvāḥ kalpe na vikalpe caranti /
S06bsu030_u:523: yatra ca na kalpo na vikalpaḥ,
S06bsu030_u:529: sa evaṃ sarvadharmān prajānan na bhūya ārambaṇe vā vikalpe vā carati vicarati vā /
S06bsu030_u:547: ahamiti vā mameti vā ahamasmīti vā na kaściddharmo vidyate /
S06bsu030_u:548: sacetkaściddharmaḥ syāt - ahamiti vā mameti vā ahamasmīti vā,
S06bsu030_u:551: yaḥ ahamiti vā mameti vā ahamasmīti vā,
S06bsu030_u:554: na hi kaścit suvikrāntavikrāmin sattvo nāma dharmaḥ saṃvidyate yasya syādahamiti vā mameti vā ahamasmīti vā /
S06bsu030_u:560: abhūtamiti suvikrāntavikrāmin nātra kiṃcidbhūtaṃ na saṃbhūtam /
S06bsu030_u:584: yena suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhāya cittamutpādayanti - idaṃ cittaṃ bodhāyotpādayiṣyāma iti bodhiṃ manyante,
S06bsu030_u:599: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin śakyaṃ bodhāya cittamutpādayitum /
S06bsu030_u:604: yā punaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin utpādasamatā, sā bhūtatā /
S06bsu030_u:605: yā ca cittasamatā yā ca bhūtasamatā,
S06bsu030_u:606: yā ca bhūtasamatā yā ca samatā sā bodhiḥ /
S06bsu030_u:609: te punarvikalpya cittaṃ bodhiṃ cābhiniviśya dvayato bodhāya cittamutpādayanti /
S06bsu030_u:637: na hi yathābhūte kaścitsattvo vā mahāsattvo vā /
S06bsu030_u:658: na ca cittamupalabhante na ca caitasikān dharmān,
S06bsu030_u:668: na te ca bhāvayanti na vibhāvīkurvanti,
S06bsu030_u:669: te bhāvānapi nopalabhante na manyante nābhiniviśante,
S06bsu030_u:671: ye ca suvikrāntavikrāmin evaṃ bodhāya cittamutpādayanti,
S06bsu030_u:689: ye punaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhernāpi dūre nābhyāsanne samanupaśyanti,
S06bsu030_u:692: etacca me saṃdhāya bhāṣitam - yo hi advayamātmānaṃ prajānāti,
S06bsu030_u:704: yo hi naiva āramupalabhate na pāraṃ manyate na pāramabhiniviśate,
S06bsu030_u:709: yatra aṇvapi na kiṃcidgantavyaṃ vā adhigantavyaṃ vā /
S06bsu030_u:710: na hyatra āgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā prajñāyate / iti ////
S06bsu030_u:717: atha khalvāyuṣmānānando bhagavantametadavocat - uttrasiṣyanti bhagavan asminnirdeśe adhimānikā nimittacāriṇa iti /
S06bsu030_u:718: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāradvatīputra āyuṣmantamānandametadavocat - agatiratrāyuṣman ānanda adhimānikānām,aviṣayaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:726: adhimānaprajñayā niradhimānatāṃ gaveṣante mānaprahāṇaṃ ca gaveṣante /
S06bsu030_u:727: ye punarāyuṣmānnānanda mānaṃ nopalabhante na samanupaśyanti na manyante nābhiniviśante,
S06bsu030_u:730: na ca āyuṣmānnānanda adhimānikānāmarthāya iyaṃ dharmadeśanā pravṛttā /
S06bsu030_u:738: ye punarāyuṣmannānanda nāpi samamupalabhante na viṣamam,
S06bsu030_u:741: na te kvaciduttrasiṣyanti na saṃtrasiṣyanti na saṃtrāsamāpatsyante //
S06bsu030_u:745: ye ca pratyekabuddhayānīyā gambhīreṣu dharmeṣu caranti,
S06bsu030_u:753: ye punarāyuṣmannānanda bodhisattvā nimittāpagatā animittacāriṇo 'nānātvacāriṇo gambhīreṣu dharmeṣvatyantameva niryātāḥ,
S06bsu030_u:757: teṣāmeṣu evaṃrūpeṣu dharmeṣu na dhandhāyitatvaṃ na kāṅkṣāyitatvam /
S06bsu030_u:759: sarvadharmāṇāṃ hi te 'nulomaṃ sthitāḥ, na vilomam /
S06bsu030_u:764: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandametadavocat - evametadānanda yathāyaṃ śāradvatīputro nirdiśati /
S06bsu030_u:768: na hi ānanda hīnādhimuktikānāṃ sattvānāmudāreṣu dharmeṣu buddhadharmeṣu cittaṃ krāmati /
S06bsu030_u:772: śuddheyamānanda parṣat pūrvajinakṛtādhikārā avaropitakuśalamūlā bahubuddhaparyupāsitā gambhīradharmādhimuktikā gambhīradharmacaritā /
S06bsu030_u:773: viśvasto hi ānanda tathāgato 'syāṃ parṣadi prasahya dharmaṃ deśayati,
S06bsu030_u:780: tadyathāpi nāma ānanda yadā anavatapto nāgarājaḥ pramudito bhavati prītisaumanasyajātaḥ,
S06bsu030_u:784: te 'pi pramuditāḥ sveṣu sveṣu bhavaneṣu pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ samarpitāḥ samanvaṅgībhūtāḥ krīḍanto mahāvṛṣṭimutsṛjanti,
S06bsu030_u:785: evameva ānanda tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya mahādharmavṛṣṭimutsṛjato ya ime jyeṣṭhaputrā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ,
S06bsu030_u:786: te 'pi iha lokadhātau svakasvakāni ca buddhakṣetrāṇi gatvā imaṃ dharmasamudayamārabhya teṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ purastānmahādharmavṛṣṭimutsṛjanti,
S06bsu030_u:788: tadyathāpi nāma ānanda sāgaro nāgarājo yadā pramudito bhavati,
S06bsu030_u:790: ye ca tatra bhavane naivāsikā nāgā bhavanti,
S06bsu030_u:793: tābhiśca te varṣadhārābhiḥ sukhaṃ ca saṃjānante /
S06bsu030_u:798: asahyā hi ānanda tā varṣadhārā anyairnāgaiḥ /
S06bsu030_u:802: ye ca tathāgatasya jyeṣṭhaputrā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ kṛtakuśalamūlā udārāśayā gambhīradharmanayanirjātāḥ,
S06bsu030_u:804: śrutvā udagrāḥ prītāḥ praharṣitāḥ sukhaṃ saṃjānante /
S06bsu030_u:805: idamānanda tathāgato 'rthavaśaṃ saṃpratītya śuddhāyāṃ parṣadi mahāsiṃhanādaṃ nadati,
S06bsu030_u:811: te khalu evaṃ saṃvibhaktāstasya rājñaścakravartino 'ntike bhūyasyā mātrayā adhikaṃ prema ca prasādaṃ ca saṃjanayeyuḥ,
S06bsu030_u:813: (Vaidya 14) evameva ānanda tathāgato 'pi dharmarājā dharmasvāmī svayaṃbhūrimān putrān saṃnipātya imaṃ dharmaratnagañjaṃ saṃvibhajati ebhyaḥ putrebhyaḥ,
S06bsu030_u:815: te mamāntike bhūyasyā mātrayā prema ca prasādaṃ ca gauravaṃ cotpādayanti,
S06bsu030_u:818: na hi ānanda hīnādhimuktikānāṃ sattvānāṃ cakravartidhanaṃ rocate /
S06bsu030_u:821: kimānanda daridrasattvānāṃ cakraratnena vā hastiratnena vā aśvaratnena vā maṇiratnena vā strīratnena vā gṛhapatiratnena vā pariṇāyakaratnena vā udārairvā vastraiḥ,
S06bsu030_u:823: yāni labdhvāpi prītā na śaknuvanti paribhoktum /
S06bsu030_u:827: nāpyānanda daridrasattvā ratnānyapi prajānanti - asya ratnasyedaṃ nāmeti /
S06bsu030_u:828: evameva ānanda ye tathāgatasya putrā dṛṣṭasatyā bodhisattvāśca mahāsattvāḥ,
S06bsu030_u:832: kimānanda daridrasattvāḥ śrutavihīnāḥ śrutavipratipannā bālā acakṣuṣmantaḥ anena dharmaratnakośena kariṣyanti?
S06bsu030_u:833: labdhvā cojjhiṣyanti anyebhyo 'pi vā dātavyaṃ maṃsyante /
S06bsu030_u:834: na hi ānanda caṇḍālā vā pukkasā vā veṇukārā vā,
S06bsu030_u:835: ye vā kecidanye daridrajīvinaḥ sattvāḥ udāraṃ ratnaṃ labdhvā svayaṃ paribhuñjate /
S06bsu030_u:836: te samardhaṃ vā vikrīṇanti ujjhanti vā /
S06bsu030_u:839: daridrasattvā ityānanda sarvabālapṛthagjanānāmetadadhivacanaṃ dṛṣṭipaṅkanimagnānāmaupalambhikānāṃ bandhābhiniviṣṭānāṃ nimittacaritānāmutpathaprayātānām,
S06bsu030_u:840: ye khalu ānanda idaṃ dharmaratnaṃ labdhvā na śaknuvanti paribhoktum,
S06bsu030_u:848: na hi ānanda śṛgālaḥ siṃhanādaṃ paribhuṅkte /
S06bsu030_u:854: ye punarānanda samyaksaṃbuddhasya potakāḥ mahābuddhasiṃhena svayaṃ bhuñjānenotpāditāḥ,
S06bsu030_u:858: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāradvatīputro bhagavantametadavocat - āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvatpariśuddheyaṃ tathāgatasya parṣat saṃnipatitā /
S06bsu030_u:861: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputrametadavocat - guṇāṃstvaṃ śāradvatīputra parṣadaḥ parikīrtayasi /
S06bsu030_u:862: āha - na hyasyā bhagavan parṣado mayā śakyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum /
S06bsu030_u:866: na hyasyāḥ parṣado guṇānāmantaḥ śakyo 'dhigantuṃ samyaksaṃbuddhairapi,
S06bsu030_u:870: svenaiva kuśalamūlena iyaṃ mama nāmadheyaṃ śrutvā parṣat saṃnipatitā /
S06bsu030_u:874: avaśyaṃ hi evaṃrūpāyāṃ dharmadeśanāyāmevaṃrūpāṇāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ saṃnipāto bhavati /
S06bsu030_u:875: ye 'pyanye śāradvatīputra buddhā bhagavantaḥ imaṃ sarvasaṃśayocchedanaṃ bodhisattvapiṭakaṃ saṃprakāśayiṣyanti,
S06bsu030_u:884: atha khalu bhagavān suvikrāntavikrāmiṇaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamāmantrayate sma - prajñāpāramitā prajñāpāramiteti suvikrāntavikrāmin katamā bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitā?
S06bsu030_u:916: tatra suvikrāntavikrāmin “yadrūpasya pāraṃ na tadrūpam” iti rūpavisaṃyogo hyeṣa nirdiṣṭaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:917: “yathā rūpasya pāraṃ tathā rūpam” iti rūpasvabhāvanirdeśo hyeṣa nirdiṣṭaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:922: “yadvijñānasya pāraṃ na tadvijñānam” iti vijñānavisaṃyogo hyeṣa nirdiṣṭaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:923: “yathā vijñānasya pāraṃ tathā vijñānam” iti vijñānasvabhāvanirdeśa eṣa nirdiṣṭaḥ,
S06bsu030_u:925: “yacca sarvadharmāṇāṃ pāraṃ na te sarvadharmāḥ” iti sarvadharmāṇāmeṣa visaṃyogo nirdiṣṭaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:926: “yathā ca sarvadharmāṇāṃ pāraṃ tathā sarvadharmāḥ” iti sarvadharmasvabhāvanirdeśa eṣa nirdiṣṭaḥ,
S06bsu030_u:935: nāpi prajñāpāramitā rūpasyādhyātmaṃ vā bahirdhā vā ubhayamantareṇa vā viprakṛṣṭā sthitā /
S06bsu030_u:936: na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇām /
S06bsu030_u:937: na vijñānasyādhyātmaṃ vā bahirdhā vā ubhayamantareṇa vā viprakṛṣṭā sthitā //
S06bsu030_u:943: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñāpāramitā kenaciddharmeṇa saṃyuktā vā visaṃyuktā vā //
S06bsu030_u:944: yā punā rūpasya tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā yathāvattathatā,
S06bsu030_u:946: evaṃ yā vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānatathatā avitathathā ananyatathatā yathāvattathātā,
S06bsu030_u:970: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpasya rūpaṃ gocaraḥ /
S06bsu030_u:971: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:973: agocara iti suvikrāntavikrāmin na rūpaṃ rūpaṃ saṃjānīte vā paśyati vā /
S06bsu030_u:976: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ na vijñānaṃ (vijñānaṃ)
S06bsu030_u:980: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ rūpasvabhāvaṃ jahāti /
S06bsu030_u:986: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ rūpaṃ saṃyojayati na visaṃyojayati /
S06bsu030_u:991: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ hīyate vā vardhate vā /
S06bsu030_u:993: na vijñānaṃ hīyate vā vardhate vā /
S06bsu030_u:996: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ saṃkliśyate vā vyavadāyate vā /
S06bsu030_u:998: na vijñānaṃ saṃkliśyate vā vyavadāyate vā /
S06bsu030_u:1001: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ viśuddhadharmi nāviśuddhadharmi /
S06bsu030_u:1002: evaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:1004: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ na viśuddhadharmatā nāviśuddhadharmatā,
S06bsu030_u:1006: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ saṃkrāmati vā avakrāmati vā /
S06bsu030_u:1008: na vijñānaṃ saṃkrāmati vā avakrāmati vā /
S06bsu030_u:1012: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ saṃyujyate vā visaṃyujyate vā /
S06bsu030_u:1014: na vijñānaṃ saṃyujyate vā visaṃyujyate vā /
S06bsu030_u:1017: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ cyavate vā upapadyate vā /
S06bsu030_u:1019: na vijñānaṃ cyavate vā upapadyate vā /
S06bsu030_u:1022: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ jāyate vā mriyate vā /
S06bsu030_u:1024: na vijñāna jāyate vā mriyate vā /
S06bsu030_u:1027: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ saṃsarati vā saṃsaraṇadharmi vā /
S06bsu030_u:1028: evaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:1029: na vijñānaṃ saṃsarati vā saṃsaraṇadharmi vā /
S06bsu030_u:1032: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ kṣīyate vā kṣayadharmi vā /
S06bsu030_u:1033: evaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:1034: na vijñānaṃ kṣīyate vā kṣayadharmi vā /
S06bsu030_u:1037: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ samudayadharmi na nirodhadharmi /
S06bsu030_u:1042: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpamutpādadharmi vā vyayadharmi vā /
S06bsu030_u:1047: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ vipariṇāmadharmi na avipariṇāmadharmi /
S06bsu030_u:1050: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ na vipariṇāmadharmatā na avipariṇāmadharmatā,
S06bsu030_u:1052: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā /
S06bsu030_u:1054: na vijñānaṃ nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā /
S06bsu030_u:1055: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ na nityatā nāpyanityatā,
S06bsu030_u:1057: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā /
S06bsu030_u:1059: na vijñānaṃ sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā /
S06bsu030_u:1060: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ nāpi sukhatā nāpyasukhatā,
S06bsu030_u:1062: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpamātmā vā anātmā vā /
S06bsu030_u:1068: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ rāgadharmi vā virāgadharmi vā /
S06bsu030_u:1070: na vijñānaṃ rāgadharmi vā virāgadharmi vā /
S06bsu030_u:1071: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ na rāgadharmatā nāpi virāgadharmatā,
S06bsu030_u:1073: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ dveṣadharmi vā adveṣadharmi vā /
S06bsu030_u:1075: na vijñānaṃ dveṣadharmi vā adveṣadharmi vā /
S06bsu030_u:1076: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ na dveṣadharmatā nāpi vigatadveṣadharmatā,
S06bsu030_u:1078: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ mohadharmi vā vigatamohadharmi vā /
S06bsu030_u:1080: na vijñānaṃ mohadharmi vā vigatamohadharmi vā /
S06bsu030_u:1081: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ na mohadharmatā nāpi vigatamohadharmatā,
S06bsu030_u:1083: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpasya kaścitkartā vā kārayitā vā /
S06bsu030_u:1085: na vijñānasya kaścitkartā vā kārayitā vā /
S06bsu030_u:1088: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpasya kaścidutthāpako vā samutthāpako vā /
S06bsu030_u:1089: evaṃ na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇām /
S06bsu030_u:1090: na vijñānasya kaścidutthāpako vā samutthāpako vā /
S06bsu030_u:1091: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ notthāpanā va samutthāpanā,
S06bsu030_u:1093: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpasya kaścijjñātā vā jñāpako vā /
S06bsu030_u:1095: na vijñānasya kaścijjñātā vā jñāpako vā /
S06bsu030_u:1098: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpasya kaścidvedako vā vedayitā vā /
S06bsu030_u:1100: na vijñānasya kaścidvedako vā vedayitā vā /
S06bsu030_u:1103: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpasya kaścijjānako vā paśyako vā /
S06bsu030_u:1104: evaṃ na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇām /
S06bsu030_u:1105: na vijñānasya kaścijjānako vā paśyako vā /
S06bsu030_u:1108: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpasyocchedatā vā śāśvatatā vā /
S06bsu030_u:1109: evaṃ na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇām /
S06bsu030_u:1113: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpasya anto vā ananto vā /
S06bsu030_u:1114: evaṃ na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇām /
S06bsu030_u:1118: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ dṛṣṭigataṃ na dṛṣṭigataprahāṇam /
S06bsu030_u:1121: yacca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ na dṛṣṭigataṃ na dṛṣṭigataprahāṇam,
S06bsu030_u:1124: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ tṛṣṇā na tṛṣṇāprahāṇam /
S06bsu030_u:1125: evaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:1127: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ na tṛṣṇā na tṛṣṇāprahāṇatā,
S06bsu030_u:1129: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ kuśalaṃ vā akuśalaṃ vā /
S06bsu030_u:1131: na vijñānaṃ kuśalaṃ vā akuśalaṃ vā /
S06bsu030_u:1132: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ na kuśalatā nākuśalatā,
S06bsu030_u:1134: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpasya gamanaṃ vā āgamanaṃ vā prajñāyate /
S06bsu030_u:1135: evaṃ na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇām /
S06bsu030_u:1136: na vijñānasya gamanaṃ vā āgamanaṃ vā prajñāyate /
S06bsu030_u:1137: yatra ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ na gatirnāgatiḥ prajñāyate,
S06bsu030_u:1139: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ sthitirvā asthitirvā /
S06bsu030_u:1142: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāmāraṃ vā pāraṃ vā /
S06bsu030_u:1143: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ nāpyāratā na pāratā,
S06bsu030_u:1145: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni śīlaṃ vā dauḥśīlyaṃ vā /
S06bsu030_u:1148: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni anunayo vā pratigho vā /
S06bsu030_u:1151: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni dadati vā pratigṛhṇāti vā /
S06bsu030_u:1154: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni kṣāntirvā akṣāntirvā /
S06bsu030_u:1157: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni vīryaṃ vā kausīdyaṃ vā /
S06bsu030_u:1160: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ samādhirna vikṣiptacittatā /
S06bsu030_u:1161: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ na samādhirna vikṣiptacittatā,
S06bsu030_u:1163: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni prajñā vā dauṣprajñyaṃ vā /
S06bsu030_u:1164: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ nāpi prajñatā nāpi dauṣprajñatā,
S06bsu030_u:1166: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāni viparyāsā vā aviparyāsā vā /
S06bsu030_u:1167: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ nāpi viparyāsatā nāpyaviparyāsatā,
S06bsu030_u:1170: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni smṛtyupasthānāni vā asmṛtyupasthānāni vā /
S06bsu030_u:1173: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni samyakprahāṇāni vā asamyakprahāṇāni vā /
S06bsu030_u:1174: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ nāpi samyakprahāṇatā nāpyasamyakprahāṇatā,
S06bsu030_u:1176: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni ṛddhipādā vā apramāṇāni vā /
S06bsu030_u:1177: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ nāpi ṛddhipādatā nāpyapramāṇatā,
S06bsu030_u:1179: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni indriyāṇi vā balabodhyaṅgamārgaṃ vā /
S06bsu030_u:1180: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ nendriyatā na balabodhyaṅgamārgatā,
S06bsu030_u:1182: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni vidyā vā vimuktirvā /
S06bsu030_u:1183: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ na vidyatā na vimuktitā,
S06bsu030_u:1185: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni dhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattyabhijñā vā nāpyanabhijñā vā /
S06bsu030_u:1186: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ na dhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattitā nāpyabhijñatā nāpyanabhijñatā,
S06bsu030_u:1188: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni śūnyatā vā animittaṃ vā apraṇihitaṃ vā /
S06bsu030_u:1189: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ na śūnyatā nānimittatā nāpraṇihitatā,
S06bsu030_u:1191: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni saṃskṛtāni vā asaṃskṛtāni vā /
S06bsu030_u:1192: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ nāpi saṃskṛtatā nāpyasaṃskṛtatā,
S06bsu030_u:1194: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni saṅgo vā asaṅgo vā /
S06bsu030_u:1195: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ nāpi saṅgatā nāpyasaṅgatā,
S06bsu030_u:1197: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni jñānaṃ vā ajñānaṃ vā /
S06bsu030_u:1198: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ nāpi jñānatā nāpyajñānatā,
S06bsu030_u:1200: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni manyanā vā spandanā vā prapañcanā vā /
S06bsu030_u:1204: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni saṃjñā nāsaṃjñā /
S06bsu030_u:1205: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ nāpi saṃjñatā nāpyasaṃjñatā,
S06bsu030_u:1207: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni upaśāntāni vā anupaśāntāni vā /
S06bsu030_u:1210: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ nirvṛttirna anirvṛttiḥ /
S06bsu030_u:1213: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin yaḥ pañcānāṃ skandhānāmabhinirvṛttiparyāpannanirdeśaḥ,
S06bsu030_u:1215: yā punaḥ pañcaskandhānāmabhinirvṛttiparyāpannanirdeśasya tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā yāvattathatā,
S06bsu030_u:1227: yā punaḥ ṣaṭtriṃśattṛṣṇācaritābhinirvṛttiparyāpannanirdeśasya tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā yāvattathatā,
S06bsu030_u:1233: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin yaḥ pañcānāmabhijñānāṃ nirdeśaḥ,
S06bsu030_u:1235: yā punaḥ pañcānāmabhijñānāṃ nirdeśasya tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā yāvattathatā,
S06bsu030_u:1237: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin yaḥ saṃskṛtaparyāpannānāṃ laukikānāṃ sarveṣāṃ kuśalākuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāmabhinirvṛttiparyāpannanirdeśaḥ,
S06bsu030_u:1239: yā punasteṣāṃ nirdeśasya tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā yāvattathatā,
S06bsu030_u:1243: yā punaḥ smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgābhinirvṛttiparyāpannanirdeśasya tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā yāvattathatā,
S06bsu030_u:1248: yā punaścaturāryasatyanirdeśasya tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā yāvattathatā,
S06bsu030_u:1252: yā punaḥ śīlasamādhiprajñāvimuktijñānadarśanaviśuddhinirdeśasya tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā yāvattathatā,
S06bsu030_u:1254: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin yo 'saṃskṛtaparyāpannānāṃ lokottarāṇāmaniśritānāmanāsravānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ nirdeśaḥ,
S06bsu030_u:1256: yā punarasaṃskṛtaparyāpannānāṃ lokottarāṇāmaniśritānāmanāsravāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ nirdeśasya tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā yāvattathatā,
S06bsu030_u:1260: yā punaḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitānutpādānabhisaṃskṛtadharmanirdeśasya tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā yāvattathatā,
S06bsu030_u:1268: evaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:1271: na kāmadhātu - na rūpadhātu - nārūpadhātuparyāpannā prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu030_u:1277: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñāpāramitā kasmiṃściddharme paryāpannā nāpyaparyāpannā /
S06bsu030_u:1278: yā ca paryāpannāparyāpannānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā yāvattathatā,
S06bsu030_u:1281: na hyete suvikrāntavikrāmin tathā dharmā yathā bālapṛthagjanairupalabdhāḥ,
S06bsu030_u:1288: na khalu punariyaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya hānāya vā vivṛddhaye vā pratyupasthitā,
S06bsu030_u:1289: nāpi kasyaciddharmasya saṃyogāya vā visaṃyogāya vā,
S06bsu030_u:1351: prativedhāya vā aprativedhāya vā pratyupasthitā iti //
S06bsu030_u:1358: atha khalu bhagavān suvikrāntavikrāmiṇaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin svapnadarśī puruṣaḥ svapnasvabhāvanirdeśaṃ ca nirdiśati,
S06bsu030_u:1365: tadyathāpiu nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin svapno na kasyaciddharmasya nidarśanena pratyupasthitaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:1366: evameva prajñāpāramitā na kasyaciddharmasya nidarśanena pratyupasthitā //
S06bsu030_u:1367: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin māyādarśī puruṣo māyāsvabhāvanirdeśaṃ ca nirdiśati,
S06bsu030_u:1372: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin māyā na kasyaciddharmasya abhinirvṛttaye pratyupasthitā,
S06bsu030_u:1373: evameva prajñāpāramitā na kasyaciddharmasya abhinirvṛttaye pratyupasthitā //
S06bsu030_u:1374: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin pratibhāsadarśī puruṣaḥ pratibhāsasvabhāvanirdeśaṃ ca nirdiśati,
S06bsu030_u:1380: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin pratibhāso na kasyaciddharmasya nirdaśanena pratyupasthitaḥ,
S06bsu030_u:1381: evameva prajñāpāramitā na kasyaciddharmasya nidarśanena pratyupasthitā //
S06bsu030_u:1382: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin marīcidarśī puruṣo marīcidarśanaṃ ca nirdiśati,
S06bsu030_u:1387: na ca punaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ svabhāvanirdeśaḥ kaścitsaṃvidyate /
S06bsu030_u:1388: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin marīcirna kasyaciddharmasya nidarśanena pratyupasthitā,
S06bsu030_u:1389: evameva prajñāpāramitā na kasyaciddharmasya nidarśanena pratyupasthitā //
S06bsu030_u:1390: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin pratiśrutkāgocarasthaḥ puruṣaḥ pratiśrutkāyāśca śabdaṃ śṛṇoti,
S06bsu030_u:1395: na ca kasyaciddharmasya nirdeśaśravaṇāya gacchati anyatra yadābhibhāṣyate tadā ājñāyate,
S06bsu030_u:1398: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin phenapiṇḍadarśī puruṣaḥ phenapiṇḍasvabhāvaṃ ca nirdiśati,
S06bsu030_u:1399: na ca phenapiṇḍasvabhāva upalabhyate adhyātmaṃ vā bahirdhā vā,
S06bsu030_u:1403: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin phenapiṇḍo na kasyaciddharmasya abhinirvṛttisvabhāvamupaiti,
S06bsu030_u:1405: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin budbudadarśī puruṣo budbudasvabhāvaṃ ca nirdiśati,
S06bsu030_u:1410: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin budbudo na kasyaciddharmasya abhinirvṛttisvabhāvena pratyupasthitaḥ,
S06bsu030_u:1411: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñāpāramitā na kasyaciddharmasya abhinirvṛttisvabhāvena pratyupasthitā //
S06bsu030_u:1412: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin puruṣaḥ kadalyāḥ sāraṃ paryeṣamāṇo nopalabhate,
S06bsu030_u:1413: atha ca tasyāḥ patraiḥ kāryaṃ karoti,
S06bsu030_u:1414: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñāpāramitāyāḥ sāraṃ na saṃvidyate,
S06bsu030_u:1416: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin puruṣa ākāśanidarśanena vyavahārati,
S06bsu030_u:1420: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin nākāśaṃ na vyavahriyate,
S06bsu030_u:1421: na ca kasyaciddharmasya nidarśanena vā pariniṣpattyā vā vyavahriyate /
S06bsu030_u:1423: na ca kasyaciddharmasya nidarśanena vā pariniṣpattyā vā vyavahriyate //
S06bsu030_u:1424: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin chāyeti cātapaśceti vyavahriyate,
S06bsu030_u:1425: na ca tau kasyaciddharmasya pariniṣpattaye pratyupasthitau,
S06bsu030_u:1430: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin maṇiratnamuttaptaṃ mahatāvabhāsena pratyupasthitaṃ bhavati,
S06bsu030_u:1431: na ca so 'vabhāso 'dhyātmaṃ vā bahirdhā vā darśanamupaiti /
S06bsu030_u:1433: na ca so 'vabhāso 'adhyātmaṃ vā bahirdhā vā darśanamupaiti //
S06bsu030_u:1434: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin tailapradyotasya dhmāyato nāsyārciṣo muhūrtamapi saṃtiṣṭhante,
S06bsu030_u:1441: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāradvatīputro bhagavantametadavocat - āścaryaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā ca nirdiṣṭā,
S06bsu030_u:1473: tadyathāpi nāma śāradvatīputra indrāyudhaṃ nānāraṅgavicitraṃ ca saṃdṛśyate,
S06bsu030_u:1477: tadyathāpi nāma śāradvatīputra ākāśe na jātu kenacitpañcāṅgulipariniṣpattirdṛṣṭapūrvā,
S06bsu030_u:1479: evamukte āyuṣmān śāradvatīputro bhagavantametadavocat - durdṛśeyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu030_u:1480: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra na kasyaciddarśanamupaiti /
S06bsu030_u:1482: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra nāsyāṃ kaścidupalabhyate yo 'bhisaṃbuddhaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:1484: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kasyaciddharmasya nidarśanena pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:1502: evamukte āyuṣmān śāradvatīputra bhagavantametadavocat - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya pariniṣpattaye pratyupasthitā na nirodhāya /
S06bsu030_u:1503: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kasyaciddharmasya utpādāya vā pariniṣpattaye vā nirodhāya vā ātmatāyai vā anātmatāyai vā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:1504: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya ārambaṇayogena pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:1505: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra nirārambaṇāḥ sarvadharmāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:1506: tathā hi ta eva dharmā na saṃvidyante,
S06bsu030_u:1508: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya hānaye vā vṛddhaye vā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:1511: yo dharmo hīyate vā vardhate vā /
S06bsu030_u:1512: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya samatikramāya pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:1513: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate,
S06bsu030_u:1515: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya apacayāya vā upacayāya vā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:1516: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate,
S06bsu030_u:1517: yasya apacayo vā upacayo vā bhavet /
S06bsu030_u:1518: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya saṃyogāya vā visaṃyogāya vā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:1519: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate,
S06bsu030_u:1521: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya naye vā vinaye vā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:1522: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate,
S06bsu030_u:1523: yo dharmo netavyo vā vinetavyo vā /
S06bsu030_u:1524: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya upakārāya vā apakārāya vā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:1525: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate,
S06bsu030_u:1526: yasya upakāraṃ vā apakāraṃ vā kuryāt /
S06bsu030_u:1527: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya saṃbhavāya vā asaṃbhavāya vā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:1528: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate,
S06bsu030_u:1530: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya saṃprayogāya vā viprayogāya vā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:1531: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate,
S06bsu030_u:1532: yo dharmaḥ saṃprayujyate vā viprayujyate vā /
S06bsu030_u:1533: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya saṃvāsāya vā asaṃvāsāya vā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:1534: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate,
S06bsu030_u:1536: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya pravṛttaye vā apravṛtaye vā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:1537: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate,
S06bsu030_u:1539: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya kriyayā vā karaṇena vā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:1540: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate,
S06bsu030_u:1541: yasya dharmasya kriyā vā karaṇaṃ vā bhavet /
S06bsu030_u:1542: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya samatayā vā viṣamatayā vā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:1543: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate,
S06bsu030_u:1544: yo dharmaḥ samo vā viṣamo vā syāt /
S06bsu030_u:1545: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya saṃgrahāya vā asaṃgrahāya vā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:1546: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate,
S06bsu030_u:1547: yo dharmaḥ saṃgrahītavyo vā utsraṣṭavyo vā syāt /
S06bsu030_u:1548: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kenacitkāryeṇa pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:1549: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate,
S06bsu030_u:1571: tadyathāpi nāma śāradvatīputra samudro gambhīro vipulo 'prameyaḥ,
S06bsu030_u:1577: tadyathāpi nāma śāradvatīputra samudro mahāsāgaraḥ sarvaratnasaṃnicayo 'prameyaratnabharito mahāratnaparipūrṇaḥ,
S06bsu030_u:1579: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya nidarśanena pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:1580: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kasyaciddharmasyopalambhena pratyupasthitā,
S06bsu030_u:1582: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya jñānena vā ajñānena vā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:1583: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate,
S06bsu030_u:1584: yasya dharmasya jñānaṃ vā ajñānaṃ vā syāt /
S06bsu030_u:1585: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya ārakṣāyai vā guptyai vā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:1586: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate,
S06bsu030_u:1587: yasya dharmasya ārakṣāṃ vā guptiṃ vā kuryāt /
S06bsu030_u:1588: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya saṃgrahāya vā parigrahāya vā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:1589: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate,
S06bsu030_u:1590: yasya dharmasya saṃgrahaṃ vā parigrahaṃ vā kuryāt /
S06bsu030_u:1591: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya niśrayeṇa vā aniśrayeṇa vā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:1592: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06bsu030_u:1593: yasya dharmasya niśrayaṃ vā aniśrayaṃ vā kuryāt /
S06bsu030_u:1594: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya ālayena vā vilayena vā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:1595: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate,
S06bsu030_u:1596: yasmin ālayaṃ vā vilayaṃ vā kuryāt /
S06bsu030_u:1597: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya abhiniveśena pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:1598: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate,
S06bsu030_u:1600: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya adhyavasānena pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:1601: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate,
S06bsu030_u:1604: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya saṃvāsena vā asaṃvāsena vā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:1605: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate,
S06bsu030_u:1607: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya saṃdhinā vā visaṃdhinā vā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:1608: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate,
S06bsu030_u:1609: yo dharmaḥ saṃdhātavyo vā visaṃdhātavyo vā /
S06bsu030_u:1610: āha - neya bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya rāgeṇa vā virāgeṇa vā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:1611: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate,
S06bsu030_u:1612: yasmin dharme rajyeta vā virajyeta vā /
S06bsu030_u:1613: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya dveṣeṇa vā adveṣeṇa vā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:1614: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate,
S06bsu030_u:1615: yo dharma sadveṣo vā vigatadveṣo vā bhavet /
S06bsu030_u:1616: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya mohena vā vigatamohena vā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:1617: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate,
S06bsu030_u:1618: yo dharmo mūḍho vā syādvigatamoho vā /
S06bsu030_u:1619: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya jñāpayitrī vā ajñāpayitrī vā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:1620: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate na samanupaśyati,
S06bsu030_u:1621: yaṃ dharmaṃ jānīyāt yasya vā dharmasya jñāpayitrī vā bhavet /
S06bsu030_u:1622: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya prakṛtyā vā aprakṛtyā vā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:1623: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kasyaciddharmasya prakṛtiṃ vā samanupaśyati /
S06bsu030_u:1624: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya śuddhyā vā viśuddhyā vā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:1625: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06bsu030_u:1631: saṃskārapariśuddhito vijñānapariśuddhito nāmarūpapariśuddhitaḥ ṣaḍāyatanapariśuddhitaḥ pariśuddhā prajñāpāramitā,
S06bsu030_u:1662: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvat prakṛtipariśuddhā prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu030_u:1665: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kasyaciddharmasya rūpapariniṣpattyā vā nidarśanena vā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:1667: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmaṃ samanupaśyati yasmin pratihanyeta /
S06bsu030_u:1671: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmaṃ yena dharmeṇa sārdhaṃ samavasaret /
S06bsu030_u:1673: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate yena dharmeṇa prajñapyeta /
S06bsu030_u:1675: (āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate yena dharmeṇa sādhāraṇā bhavet /
S06bsu030_u:1689: dānānantatayā śīlānantatayā kṣāntyanantatayā vīryānantatayā dhyānānantatayā prajñānantatayā anantapāramiteyaṃ prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu030_u:1704: na hyasyāḥ śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitāyā anto vā madhyaṃ vā paryavasānaṃ vā upalabhyate,
S06bsu030_u:1710: abdhātvanantatayā tejodhātvanantatayā vāyudhātvanantatayā vijñānadhātvanantatayā prajñāpāramitānantatā anugantavyā /
S06bsu030_u:1712: na hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā deśasthā na pradeśasthā /
S06bsu030_u:1720: dānānantatayā śīlānantatayā kṣāntyanantatayā vīryānantatayā dhyānānantatayā prajñānantatayā śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitānantatā anugantavyā /
S06bsu030_u:1726: pṛthagjanadharmāparyantatayā śrāvakadharmāparyantatayā pratyekabuddhadharmāparyantatayā buddhadharmāparyantatayā śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitāparyantatā anugantavyā /
S06bsu030_u:1727: vidyāparyantatayā vimuktyaparyantatayā vimuktijñā[nadarśa]nāparyantatayā śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitāparyantatā anugantavyā /
S06bsu030_u:1733: evamukte āyuṣmān śāradvatīputro bhagavantametadavocat - kīdṛśānāṃ bhagavan bodhisattvānāmeṣu dharmeṣu viṣayaḥ?
S06bsu030_u:1734: bhagavānāha - ye te śāradvatīputra bodhisattvā dharmamapi nopalabhante prāgevādharmam,
S06bsu030_u:1736: śīlamapi nopalabhante na manyante prāgeva dauḥśīlyam,
S06bsu030_u:1739: anadhyavasitāśca kāye jīvite ca prāgeva bāhyeṣu vastuṣu,
S06bsu030_u:1743: teṣāṃ śāriputra bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmeṣu dharmeṣu viṣayaśca gatiśca,
S06bsu030_u:1744: sarvaviṣayā aviṣayā iti ca yeṣāṃ parijānante (parijñānam?)
S06bsu030_u:1753: yeṣāṃ śāradvatīputra eṣu dharmeṣu viṣayo gatiśca /
S06bsu030_u:1754: nāhaṃ śāradvatīputra asyāṃ parṣadi samanupaśyāmi ekamapi bodhisattvam,
S06bsu030_u:1755: yasya naiṣu dharmeṣu viṣayo vā adhimuktirvā,
S06bsu030_u:1756: yo vā eṣu dharmeṣu sākāṅkṣo vā savicikitso vā /
S06bsu030_u:1757: niṣkāṅkṣeyaṃ śāradvatīputra parṣadeṣu dharmeṣu nirvicikitsā nirvaimatikā /
S06bsu030_u:1758: nāsti śāradvatīputra eṣāṃ bodhisatvānāmeṣu dharmeṣu vimatiḥ /
S06bsu030_u:1759: vimatisamuddhātāya śāradvatīputra ete satpuruṣāḥ sarvasattvānāṃ sthitāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:1760: niḥsaṃśayā hyete śāradvatīputra eṣvevaṃrūpeṣu dharmeṣu saṃśayasamatikrāntāḥ //
S06bsu030_u:1761: ye 'pi te śāradvatīputra paścime kāle paścime samaye imāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ śroṣyanti,
S06bsu030_u:1765: nāhaṃ śāradvatīputra parīttakuśalamūlānāṃ sattvānāmeṣu dharmeṣvadhimuktiṃ vadāmi /
S06bsu030_u:1768: nāpi te śāradvatīputra sattvāḥ parīttakuśalamūlasamanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu030_u:1769: yeṣāmiyaṃ dharmadeśanāṃ śrotrapathamapyāgamiṣyati kimaṅga punarye udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti /
S06bsu030_u:1772: evaṃ ca te siṃhanādaṃ nadiṣyanti yathāhametarhi siṃhanādaṃ nadāmi astambhitanādaṃ mahāpuruṣanādaṃ svayaṃbhūnādam /
S06bsu030_u:1773: ye eṣu dharmeṣvatyantaśaḥ śraddhāṃ janayitvā chandaṃ janayiṣyanti anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau, (Vaidya 35)
S06bsu030_u:1777: ya imān gambhīrān dharmān śrutvā prītiṃ ca vindanti,
S06bsu030_u:1781: ye gambhīrān dharmān śrutvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayanti,
S06bsu030_u:1783: nāhaṃ śāradvatīputra tān sattvān mahāsaṃsārasaṃprasthitāniti vadāmi yeṣāmayaṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśaḥ śravaṇapathamapyāgamiṣyati,
S06bsu030_u:1785: paṭhiṣyanti adhimokṣyanti udāraṃ ca prītisaumanasyaṃ janayiṣyanti,
S06bsu030_u:1786: eṣu dharmeṣu chandaṃ janayiṣyanti punaḥ punaḥ śravaṇāyāpi,
S06bsu030_u:1787: kaḥ punarvādaḥ uddeṣṭuṃ vā svādhyātuṃ vā parebhyo deśayituṃ vā /
S06bsu030_u:1788: vyākaromyahaṃ śāradvatīputra anavakrāntaniyāmān aniyatān śrāvakapratyekabuddhayāne anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhauḥ /
S06bsu030_u:1789: nāhaṃ śāradvatīputra hīnadharmasamanvāgatānāṃ sattvānāmagrato dharmeṣvavakāśaṃ samanupaśyāmi /
S06bsu030_u:1791: yadbhūyasā ca sattvā hīnādhimuktikā hīnadharmasamanvāgatā akṛtakalyāṇāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:1793: ye punaste śāradvatīputra udārāḥ sattvā udāradharmādhimuktā mahāyānasaṃprasthitāḥ supariprāptakāryāḥ susaṃnāhasaṃnaddhāḥ suvicitrārthā mahāmārgeṇa saṃprasthitā aviṣameṇa ṛjunā,
S06bsu030_u:1794: agahanena samena apagatakhāṇukaṇṭakena apagataśvabhraprapātena śucinā apagatakilbiṣeṇa akuṭilena avaṅkena,
S06bsu030_u:1795: ye lokahitāya saṃprasthitā lokasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya va devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca,
S06bsu030_u:1799: teṣāṃ śāradvatīputra tathārūpāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmidaṃ mahādhanam /
S06bsu030_u:1800: ta eva ca śāradvatīputra mahāsattvā asya dharmaratnasya pratyeṣakāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:1803: na hi śāradvatīputra akṛtapuṇyānāṃ sattvānāmakṛtakalyāṇānāṃ hīnādhimuktikānāṃ śraddhāvihīnānāmasminnudāre dhane 'dhimuktirjāyate /
S06bsu030_u:1804: etacca me śāradvatīputra saṃdhāya bhāṣitam - dhātuśaḥ satvāḥ saṃsyandanti hīnādhimuktikā hīnādhimuktikaiḥ,
S06bsu030_u:1806: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāradvatīputro bhagavantametadavocat - kiṃgocarā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā?
S06bsu030_u:1807: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputrametadavocat - anantaviṣayagocarā śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu030_u:1812: tadyathāpi nāma śāradvatīputra ākāśadhāturvāyudhātuśca na kvacitsaṃdṛśyete,
S06bsu030_u:1814: evameva śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kvaciddharme saṃdṛśyate,
S06bsu030_u:1816: tadyathāpi nāma śāradvatīputra ākāśadhāturvāyudhātuśca agrāhyāpariniṣpattito na varṇanimittena saṃkhyāṃ gacchataḥ,
S06bsu030_u:1818: kenacidvarṇanimittena saṃkhyāṃ gacchati vā upaiti vā /
S06bsu030_u:1819: tadyathāpi nāma śāradvatīputra ākāśadhāturvāyudhātuśca na kasyaciddharmasya pariniṣpattidarśanenopayātau,
S06bsu030_u:1823: tadyathāpi nāma śāradvatīputra ākāśadhātuśca vāyudhātuśca na kasyaciddharmasya pariciṣpattilakṣaṇenopagacchataḥ,
S06bsu030_u:1824: evameva śāradavtīputra prajñāpāramitā na kasyaciddharmasya pariniṣpattilakṣaṇenopaiti /
S06bsu030_u:1828: tadyathāpi nāma śāradvatīputra ākāśadhāturvāyudhātudhca na kasyaciddharmasya pariniṣpattilakṣaṇenopagacchataḥ,
S06bsu030_u:1839: na ca asaṅgasya lakṣaṇaṃ na nimittam /
S06bsu030_u:1844: na hi śāradvatīputra saṅge saṅgo cidyate,
S06bsu030_u:1869: api tu khalu punaḥ sattvānāmetadasaṅgalakṣaṇanidarśanaṃ kṛtam /
S06bsu030_u:1907: n ahi śāradvtīputra gocaranidarśanalakṣaṇena prajñāpāramitā bhāvyate /
S06bsu030_u:1908: viṣaya iti śāradvatīputra aviṣaya e ṣa dharmāṇām eṣā yathābhūtatā,
S06bsu030_u:1918: eṣvevaṃrūpeṣu śāradvatīputra dharmeṣu na bahavaḥ sahāyakāḥ pratilabhyante /
S06bsu030_u:1921: na hyeṣu śāradvatīputra dharmeṣu kaścidanyaḥ sahāyaḥ,
S06bsu030_u:1923: teṣāmapi tāvacchāradvatīputra dṛṣṭisaṃpannānāmeṣu dharmeṣu caritānāṃ saṃśayaḥ syāt /
S06bsu030_u:1924: niḥsaṃśayaḥ śāradvatīputra kāyasākṣī ca bodhisattvaśca pratilabdhakṣāntikaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:1926: nāyaṃ śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitānirdeśo hīnādhimuktikānāṃ sattvānāṃ hastaṃ gamiṣyati /
S06bsu030_u:1930: kṛtādhikārā buddheṣu bhagavatsu bodhāyāvaropitabuddhabījā buddhayānasamārūḍhā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmāsannasthāyino yoniśaḥ praśnapṛcchakāḥ,
S06bsu030_u:1939: atha ca śāradvatīputra vyākṛtā eva te mantavyāḥ saṃmukhavyākaraṇena /
S06bsu030_u:1940: na hi śāradvatīputra aparipakvakuśalamūlānāṃ sattvānāmayaṃ sūtrāntaḥ śrotrapathamapyāgamiṣyati,
S06bsu030_u:1941: kimaṅga punaryadetaṃ sūtrāntaṃ pratilabheran vā lekhayeyurvā ārādhayeyurvā uddiśeyurvā dhyāyeran vā,
S06bsu030_u:1945: ya imaṃ sūtrāntaṃ śroṣyanti likhiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti svādhyāsyanti /
S06bsu030_u:1948: api tu khalu punaḥ śāradvatīputra ārocayāmi te,
S06bsu030_u:1950: na tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā bodhisattvayānīyena vā śrāvakayānīyena vā imān dharmān pratilabhya alpotsukena bhavitavyam,
S06bsu030_u:1951: kusīdena vā middhabahulena vā asaṃprajñena vā anupasthitasmṛtinā vā vikṣiptacittena vā āmiṣagṛddhena vā lolena vā mukhareṇa vā tundena vā pragalbhena vā prākṛtendriyeṇa vā /
S06bsu030_u:1952: kiṃcāpi śāradvatīputra kuśalamūlāni kṛtāni na visaṃvādayanti /
S06bsu030_u:1953: api tu khalu imān dharmān labdhvā bodhisattvena bhūyasyā mātrayā apramādaśca vīryaṃ ca utsāhaśca chandaśca akausīdyaṃ ca saṃvṛtendriyatā ca amukharatā cāsevitavyā,
S06bsu030_u:1957: yadbodhisattvo vā śrāvakayāniko vā evaṃrūpān dharmān śrutvā pramādamāpadyeta,
S06bsu030_u:1964: nāpi tena ime evaṃrūpā dharmāḥ śrutā bhaveyuḥ /
S06bsu030_u:1967: na hi śāradvatīputra vipratipannena ayaṃ dharmaḥ śruto bhavati /
S06bsu030_u:1972: kṣāntisaṃpannasya śāradvatīputra pudgalasya pratipattisthitasya na bhūyo 'pāyagamanaṃ bhavati,
S06bsu030_u:1977: yaḥ śāradvatīputra eṣu dharmeṣu pariniṣpannaḥ śikṣito labdhakṣāntirna bhūyasā apāyagamanasaṃvartanīyaṃ karma kuryāt /
S06bsu030_u:1978: na cāsya bhūyaḥ kausīdyaṃ vā hīnabhāgīyaṃ vā bhavet /
S06bsu030_u:1982: parijñāto hi śāradvatīputra tena bhavati saṃkleśaśca vyavadānaṃ ca,
S06bsu030_u:1983: dṛṣṭaṃ ca tena yathābhūtaṃ bhavati - sarvadharmā viparyāsasamutthitā abhūtā iti /
S06bsu030_u:1984: sa evaṃ samyagdarśī kṣāntisaṃpanno bhavati sūrato 'mandavān (?)
S06bsu030_u:1986: devā api śāradvatīputra tathārūpebhyaḥ spṛhayanti prāgeva manuṣyāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:1987: devānāmapi te tathārūpāḥ sattvāḥ spṛhaṇīyā bhavanti prāgeva manuṣyāṇām /
S06bsu030_u:1988: devānāmapi te satkārārhā bhavanti prāgeva manuṣyāṇām /
S06bsu030_u:1989: devairapi te rakṣaṇīyā bhavanti prāgeva manuṣyaiḥ /
S06bsu030_u:1997: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāradvatīputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - kimāyuṣman subhūte tūṣṇīṃbhāvenātināmayasi?
S06bsu030_u:1998: kiṃ na pratibhāti te prajñāpāramitāmārabhya ayaṃ śāstā svayaṃ saṃmukhībhūtaḥ,
S06bsu030_u:1999: iyaṃ ca parṣad bhājanībhūtā gambhīrāyā dharmadeśanāyāḥ?
S06bsu030_u:2002_0: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputramevamāha - nāhaṃ tamāyuṣman dharmaṃ
S06bsu030_u:2002_1: samanupaśyāmi yaṃ me ārabhya pratibhāyāt - na cāhamāyuṣman śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitāṃ samanupaśyāmi,
S06bsu030_u:2007: evaṃ samanupaśyan nāhamāyuṣman śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yacca pratibhāyāt,
S06bsu030_u:2017: na hi āyuṣman śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā śakyodāhārtuṃ vā,
S06bsu030_u:2022: na hi āyuṣman śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā atītā vā anāgatā vā pratyutpannā vā /
S06bsu030_u:2023: na hi āyuṣman śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā atītalakṣaṇā vā śakyā nirdeṣṭum,
S06bsu030_u:2025: alakṣaṇā avyavahārā eṣā āyuṣman śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu030_u:2028: na hi āyuṣman śāradvatīputra yadrūpasya atītalakṣaṇaṃ vā anāgatalakṣaṇaṃ vā pratyutpannalakṣaṇaṃ vā,
S06bsu030_u:2030: nāpi yadvedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāmatītalakṣaṇaṃ vā anāgatalakṣaṇaṃ vā pratyutpannalakṣaṇaṃ vā sā prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu030_u:2031: yacca āyuṣman śāradvatīputra atītānāgatapratyutpannarūpalakṣaṇasya tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā yāvattathatā,
S06bsu030_u:2033: yā ca atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā yāvattathatā,
S06bsu030_u:2035: yā ca āyuṣman śāradvatīputra atītānāgatapratyutpannasya rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānalakṣaṇasya tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā yāvattathatā,
S06bsu030_u:2036: sā na śakyā prajñapayituṃ vā udāhartuṃ vā abhilapituṃ vā vākkarmaṇā vā visarjayitum /
S06bsu030_u:2039: na hi āyuṣman śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya nirdeśalakṣaṇena pratyupasthitā,
S06bsu030_u:2063: sā na kasyaciddarśanamupaiti - iyaṃ vā prajñāpāramitā,
S06bsu030_u:2067: nāhamāyuṣman śāradvatīputra taṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi yena dharmeṇa prajñāpāramitā nirdiśyeta /
S06bsu030_u:2068: na hi āyuṣman śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya nidarśanamupaiti vā utpaśyati vā /
S06bsu030_u:2069: na hi āyuṣman śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā rūpasya nidarśanamupaiti,
S06bsu030_u:2075: yāpi sā āyuṣman śāradvatīputra prajñā lokottarā nirvedhagāminī,
S06bsu030_u:2077: tadyathā āyuṣman śāradvatīputra dharmo nidarśanaṃ nopaiti kasyaciddharmasya,
S06bsu030_u:2079: api tu khalu āyuṣman śāradvatīputra ya evaṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmanayaṃ prajānanti,
S06bsu030_u:2081: na hi āyuṣman śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya saṃdarśanena pratyupasthitā,
S06bsu030_u:2083: na hi āyuṣman śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā rūpasya saṃdarśanena pratyupasthitā,
S06bsu030_u:2089: na saṃkleśasya na vyavadānasya saṃdarśanena pratyupasthitā,
S06bsu030_u:2118: nāpi kasyaciddharmasya jñānena vā ajñānena vā saṃdarśanena vā nidarśanena vā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:2119: nāpyanutpādajñānasya vā kṣayajñānasya vā nirodhajñānasya vā saṃdarśanena vā nidarśanena vā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:2120: nāpi nirvāṇasya saṃdarśanena vā nidarśanena vā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:2121: tadyathā āyuṣman śāradvatīputra na kasyaciddharmasya saṃdarśanena vā pratyupasthitā nidarśanena vā,
S06bsu030_u:2123: api tu khalu āyuṣman śāradvatīputra ya evaṃ nirdeśamavabudhyate - na prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya saṃdarśanena vā nidarśanena vā pratyupasthiteti,
S06bsu030_u:2126: na hi āyuṣman śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya yogāya vā viyogāya vā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:2128: na hi āyuṣman śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā rūpaṃ saṃyojayati na visaṃyojayati /
S06bsu030_u:2129: evaṃ na vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni saṃyojayati na visaṃyojayati /
S06bsu030_u:2131: na kāmadhātuṃ na rūpadhātuṃ nārūpyadhātuṃ saṃyojayati na visaṃyojayati /
S06bsu030_u:2132: na pṛthivīdhātuṃ nābdhātuṃ na tejodhātuṃ na vāyudhātuṃ saṃyojayati na visaṃyojayati /
S06bsu030_u:2133: na sattvadhātuṃ nātmadhātuṃ na dharmadhātuṃ nākāśadhātuṃ saṃyojayati na visaṃyojayati /
S06bsu030_u:2134: na dānaṃ na mātsaryaṃ na śīlaṃ na dauḥśīlyaṃ na kṣāntiṃ na vyāpādaṃ na vīryaṃ na kausīdyaṃ na dhyānaṃ na vikṣepaṃ na prajñāṃ na dauṣprajñyaṃ saṃyojayati na visaṃyojayati /
S06bsu030_u:2135: na smṛtyupasthānāni na samyakprahāṇāni na ṛddhipādāpramāṇāni nendriyabalabodhyaṅgadhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattyabhijñāḥ saṃyojayati na visaṃyojayati /
S06bsu030_u:2136: na mārgaṃ na mārgaphalaṃ na duḥkhaṃ na duḥkhasamudayaṃ na nirodhaṃ saṃyojayati na visaṃyojayati /
S06bsu030_u:2137: na śrāvakabhūmiṃ na pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ na bodhisattvabhūmiṃ na buddhabhūmiṃ saṃyojayati na visaṃyojayati /
S06bsu030_u:2138: na śrāvakadharmān na pratyekabuddhadharmān na bodhisattvadharmān na buddhadharmān saṃyojayati na visaṃyojayati /
S06bsu030_u:2140: nāsaṅgatānutpādajñānaṃ na kṣayajñānaṃ na nirvāṇaṃ saṃyojayati na visaṃyojayati /
S06bsu030_u:2141: tadyathā āyuṣman śāradvatīputra dharmo na kasyaciddharmasya saṃyogāya vā visaṃyogāya vā pratyupasthitaḥ,
S06bsu030_u:2143: idamāyuṣman śāradvatīputra arthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyannahamevaṃ vadāmi - nāhaṃ taṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi yo me dharmaḥ pratibhāyāt,
S06bsu030_u:2152: atha khalu bhagavān suvikrāntavikrāmiṇaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - iha khalu suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranna kvaciddharme carati /
S06bsu030_u:2161: nāpi viparyāse vā abhūte vā caran bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati /
S06bsu030_u:2168: ye ca na tathā yathā gṛhītāḥ,
S06bsu030_u:2170: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo mahāsattvo viparyāse vā abhūte vā carati /
S06bsu030_u:2176: sā na śakyā ādarśayitum - iyaṃ vā bodhisattvacaryā,
S06bsu030_u:2181: sarvacaryāvinivṛttaye hi bodhisattvā bodhisattvacaryāṃ caranti pṛthagjanacaryāvinivṛttaye śrāvakacaryāvinivṛtaye pratyekabuddhacaryāvinivṛttaye /
S06bsu030_u:2183: teṣvapi bodhisattvā na caranti nābhiniviśante - ime vā te bodhisattvadharmāḥ,
S06bsu030_u:2196: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin dharmaḥ kalpo vā vikalpo vā /
S06bsu030_u:2201: yo naiva ante na anante carati,
S06bsu030_u:2203: madhyamapi suvikrāntavikrāmin samanupaśyan madhye caran anta eva carati /
S06bsu030_u:2204: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin madhyasya kāciccaryā (vā kiṃci)
S06bsu030_u:2208: na ca suvikrāntavikrāmin āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ kasyaciddharmasyopalambhena pratyupasthitaḥ,
S06bsu030_u:2210: api tu yasmin samaye suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na kaṃciddharmaṃ bhāvayati na vibhāvayati,
S06bsu030_u:2212: sa sarvadharmān na bhāvayanna vibhāvayan bhāvanāsamatikrānto dharmasamatāmanuprāpnoti,
S06bsu030_u:2217: vibhāvito hi sa mārgo na bhāvito na vibhāvitaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:2223: sacetkhalu punaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bhāvanā syādvibhāvanā vā,
S06bsu030_u:2226: vibhāvaneti suvikrāntavikrāmin vigatā asyāṃ bhāvaneti vibhāvanā,
S06bsu030_u:2234: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin viparyāso viparyāsaṃ samutthāpayati /
S06bsu030_u:2251: sarvā hi suvikrāntavikrāmin caryā sā caryāsamutthānā /
S06bsu030_u:2258: acaryeti suvikrāntavikrāmin yanna kvaciddharme carati na vicarati na caryālakṣaṇaṃ saṃdarśayati,
S06bsu030_u:2262: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo rūpārambaṇe caraṃścarati prajñāpāramitāyām,
S06bsu030_u:2269: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaścakṣurārambaṇe caraṃścarati prajñāpāramitāyām,
S06bsu030_u:2276: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyadharmārambaṇe caraṃścarati prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu030_u:2284: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo nāmarūpārambaṇe caraṃścarati prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu030_u:2294: parijñātā hi taiḥ sattvasaṃjñā ca ātmasaṃjñā ca - abhūtaiṣā sattvasaṃjñā ca ātmasaṃjñā ceti /
S06bsu030_u:2295: yaiśca abhūtā sattvasaṃjñā ca ātmasaṃjñā ca jñātā,
S06bsu030_u:2300_0: ye na suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvā jīvasaṃjñāyāṃ vā poṣapuruṣapudgalamanujamānavotthāpakasamutthāpakakārakakārayitṛvedakavedayitṛsaṃjñāyāṃ
S06bsu030_u:2306: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvā viparyāsairvā dṛṣṭigatairvā nīvaraṇairvā carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu030_u:2312: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvāḥ pratītyasamutpādārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu030_u:2316: yā ca parijñā pratītyasamutpādasya pratītyasamutpādārambaṇasya ca,
S06bsu030_u:2319: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvāḥ kāmadhātvārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu030_u:2326: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvā dānamātsaryaśīladauḥśīlyārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu030_u:2332: na (Vaidya 45) hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvāḥ kṣāntivyāpādavīryakausīdyadhyānavikṣepaprajñādauṣprajñyārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu030_u:2338: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvā aviparyāsasamyakprahāṇasmṛtyupasthānāpramāṇārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu030_u:2344: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvā indriyabalabodhyaṅgadhyānasamādhisamāpattyārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu030_u:2350: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvā duḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu030_u:2357: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvā vidyāvimuktyārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu030_u:2363: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvā anutpādārambaṇe vā kṣayārambaṇe vā anabhisaṃskārārambaṇe vā carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu030_u:2369: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvāḥ pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu030_u:2375: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvāḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmyārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu030_u:2381: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvāḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhadharmārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu030_u:2387: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin nirvāṇārambaṇe bodhisattvāścarantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu030_u:2393: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvā lakṣaṇapariśuddhyārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām,
S06bsu030_u:2408: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo rūpārambaṇapariśuddhāvapi na carati /
S06bsu030_u:2415: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na cakṣurārambaṇaviśuddhau carati,
S06bsu030_u:2421: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyadharmārambaṇaviśuddhāvapi carati /
S06bsu030_u:2426: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na nāmarūpārambaṇaviśuddhāvapi carati /
S06bsu030_u:2431: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo nātmasattvārambaṇaviśuddhāvapi carati /
S06bsu030_u:2436: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na jīvabhavapudgalakārakakārayitrutthāpakasamutthāpakavedakavedayitṛdraṣṭrārambaṇapariśuddhāvapi carati /
S06bsu030_u:2441: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na viparyāsadṛṣṭigatārambaṇapariśuddhāvapi carati /
S06bsu030_u:2446: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na nīvaraṇārambaṇaviśuddhāvapi carati /
S06bsu030_u:2449: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na pratītyasamutpādārambaṇaviśuddhāvapi carati /
S06bsu030_u:2452: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na kāmadhāturūpadhātvārūpyadhātvārambaṇaviśuddhāvapi carati /
S06bsu030_u:2455: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na dānamātsaryaśīladauḥśīlyārambaṇaviśuddhāvapi carati /
S06bsu030_u:2459: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na kṣāntivyāpādavīryakausīdyadhyānavikṣepaprajñādauṣprajñyārambaṇaviśuddhāvapi carati /
S06bsu030_u:2462: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo nātītānāgatapratyutpannārambaṇaviśuddhapi carati /
S06bsu030_u:2465: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo nāsaṅgāvaraṇaviśuddhāvapi carati /
S06bsu030_u:2468: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo nābhijñārambaṇaviśuddhāvapi carati /
S06bsu030_u:2471: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na sarvajñatārambaṇaviśuddhāvapi carati /
S06bsu030_u:2478: iyaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvārambaṇaprakṛtipariśuddhiḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ //
S06bsu030_u:2479: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ idaṃ rūpamiti na samanupaśyati,
S06bsu030_u:2483: sa evaṃ rūpamasamanupaśyan na rūpamutkṣipati na nikṣipati,
S06bsu030_u:2493: sa evaṃ vijñānamasamanupaśyan na vijñānamutkṣipati na nikṣipati,
S06bsu030_u:2498: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin evaṃ caran bodhisattvo na rūpamatītamiti carati,
S06bsu030_u:2518: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rūpasamudaye carati,
S06bsu030_u:2544: sarvāṇyetāni suvikrāntavikrāmin manyitāni spanditāni prapañcitāni tṛṣṇāgatāni /
S06bsu030_u:2549: tatra suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvāḥ sarvāṇyetāni manyitaspanditaprapañcitāni tṛṣṇāgatāni jñātvā sarvājñānasamuddhātān na kaṃciddharmaṃ manyante,
S06bsu030_u:2552: te anālayā asaṃyogā avisaṃyogā na kvacidutthāpayanti,
S06bsu030_u:2554: ayaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya sarvamanyanāsamuddhātaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ //
S06bsu030_u:2555: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyaṃ caran na rūpaṃ nityaṃ nānityamiti carati,
S06bsu030_u:2570: tatra suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ etāni sarvāṇi vitarkitāni vicaritāni caritavicaritāni jñātvā sarvacaryāsamuddhātāya sarvacaryāparijñāyai prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati /
S06bsu030_u:2572: evamukte suvikrāntavikrāmī bodhisattvo bhagavantometadavocat - acintyeyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitācaryā /
S06bsu030_u:2615: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitācaryā cittajanikā,
S06bsu030_u:2619: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin yā cittasya prakṛtiḥ sā utpadyate jā jāyate vā /
S06bsu030_u:2623: na punaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bālapṛthagjanā jānanti vivṛtaṃ cittamiti /
S06bsu030_u:2663: tatra suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ imānevaṃrūpānabhiniveśān sattvānāṃ viparyāsacittajān samanupaśyan na kvacidviparyāse cittamutpādayati /
S06bsu030_u:2669: tatra bodhisattvo 'pyārambaṇaṃ prajānannapi cittasyotpattiṃ prajānāti - kutaścittamutpadyate?
S06bsu030_u:2671: tasyaivaṃ bhavati - ārambaṇaṃ pratītya cittamutpadyate iti /
S06bsu030_u:2672: sa ārambaṇaṃ parijñāya na cittamutpādayati nāpi nirodhayati /
S06bsu030_u:2673: tasya taccittaṃ prabhāsvaraṃ bhavati asaṃkliṣṭaṃ kamanīyaṃ pariśuddham /
S06bsu030_u:2674: sa cittānutpādasthito na kaṃciddharmamutpādayati na nirodhayati /
S06bsu030_u:2678: tasyaivaṃ carato naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ carāmi prajñāpāramitāyām,
S06bsu030_u:2686: atha tāmapi prajñāpāramitāṃ na samanupaśyati nopalabhate - ahaṃ carāmi prajñāpāramitāyāmiti na carati,
S06bsu030_u:2688: evamukte suvikrāntavikrāmī bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - anuttareyaṃ caryā bhagavan bodhisattvasya yaduta prajñāpāramitācaryā /
S06bsu030_u:2689: prabhāsvareyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya caryā yaduta prajñāpāramitācaryā /
S06bsu030_u:2690: niruttareyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya caryā yaduta prajñāpāramitācaryā /
S06bsu030_u:2691: atyadbhuteyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya caryā yaduta prajñāpāramitācaryā /
S06bsu030_u:2692_0: anavakrānteyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya caryā māreṇa vā māraparṣadbhirvā anyairvā
S06bsu030_u:2694: sarvalokābhyudayacaryeyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya caryā yaduta prajñāpāramitācaryā //
S06bsu030_u:2695: evamukte bhagavān suvikrāntavikrāmiṇaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - evametat suvikrāntavikrāmin, evametat /
S06bsu030_u:2696: anavakrāntacaryeyaṃ bodhisattvasya māreṇa vā mārakāyikairvā devaputrairmāraparṣadā vā,
S06bsu030_u:2702: sacet suvikrāntavikrāmin iyaṃ caryā śrāvakayānīyānāṃ vā pratyekabuddhayānīyānāṃ vā abhaviṣyat,
S06bsu030_u:2703: na teṣāṃ kaścidvyavahāro 'bhaviṣyat - śrāvakayānīyā vā pratyekabuddhayānīyā veti /
S06bsu030_u:2706: yasmāttarhi suvikrāntavikrāmin na śrāvakayānīyānāṃ va pratyekabuddhayānīyānāmiyaṃ caryā,
S06bsu030_u:2707: tasmātte na bodhisattvā iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchanti,
S06bsu030_u:2711: evaṃ carantaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvāḥ kṣipraṃ caturvaiśāradyatāmanuprāpnuvanti,
S06bsu030_u:2712: anabhisaṃbuddhā eva yāvadanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ praṇidhānavaśena ca buddhānāṃ ca bhagavatāmadhiṣṭhānavaśena /
S06bsu030_u:2713: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin śrāvakayānikānāṃ vā pratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ vā caturvaiśāradyaṃ bhavati,
S06bsu030_u:2720: ābhiścatasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhiḥ samanvāgatā anabhisaṃbuddhā eva praṇidhānavaśena vaiśāradyāni pratigṛhṇanti /
S06bsu030_u:2721: tathāgatā api tān kuśalamūlasamanvāgatāniti viditvā prajñāpāramitābhūmyanuprāptāniti viditvā adhitiṣṭhanti caturvaiśāradyena /
S06bsu030_u:2722: tasmāttarhi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvena catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'nuprāptukāmena kṣipraṃ caturvaiśāradyakuśalena bhavitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ caritavyam //
S06bsu030_u:2723: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvadharmāṇāṃ hetuṃ ca samudayaṃ ca astaṃgamaṃ ca nirodhaṃ ca pravidhyati na kaṃciddharmam,
S06bsu030_u:2726: teṣāṃ hetusamudayanirodhamārgalakṣaṇaṃ prajānan na rūpaṃ prabhāvayati na vibhāvayati /
S06bsu030_u:2733: na kāmadhātuṃ na rūpadhātuṃ nārūpyadhātuṃ bhāvayati na vibhāvayati /
S06bsu030_u:2734: na sattvadhātuṃ nātmadhātuṃ bhāvayati na vibhāvayati /
S06bsu030_u:2735: nocchedadṛṣṭiṃ na śāśvatadṛṣṭiṃ bhāvayati na vibhāvayati /
S06bsu030_u:2739: va vīryakausīdyaṃ na dhyānavikṣepaṃ na prajñādauṣprajñyaṃ bhāvayati na vibhāvayati /
S06bsu030_u:2744: nānutpādajñānaṃ na kṣayajñānaṃ nābhisaṃskārajñānaṃ bhāvayati na vibhāvayati /
S06bsu030_u:2746: na śrāvakabhūmiṃ na pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ bhāvayati na vibhāvayati /
S06bsu030_u:2747: na pṛthagjanadharmān na śrāvakadharmān na pratyekabuddhadharmān (na bodhisattvadharmabuddhadharmān)
S06bsu030_u:2749: na śamathaṃ na vidarśanāṃ bhāvayati na vibhāvayati /
S06bsu030_u:2785: viparyāsasamutthitatayā hi suvikrāntavikrāmin sattvā bhāvayanti ca vibhāvayanti ca /
S06bsu030_u:2791: yasmin samaye suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattva evaṃ dharmeṣu dharmānudarśī viharan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na kaṃciddharmaṃ bhāvayati na vibhāvayati,
S06bsu030_u:2793: evaṃ carata evaṃ viharataḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitābhāvanā paripūriṃ gacchati //
S06bsu030_u:2795: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato na rūpasaṃprayoganimittaṃ cittamutpadyate /
S06bsu030_u:2821: so 'nayā cittaviśuddhyā samanvāgataḥ sattvān maitryā spharati karuṇayā muditayopekṣayā /
S06bsu030_u:2826: tasyaibhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgatasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ kṣipraṃ prajñāpāramitābhāvanā paripūriṃ gacchati /
S06bsu030_u:2827: sa evaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayan na rūpamupaiti, nopādatte /
S06bsu030_u:2828: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān /
S06bsu030_u:2831: na kāmadhātuṃ na rūpadhātuṃ nārūpyadhātumupaiti, nopādatte /
S06bsu030_u:2843: nātmadhātuṃ na sattvadhātuṃ na dharmadhātumupaiti nopādatte /
S06bsu030_u:2854: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin kaściddharma upādātavyo nāpi kenacidupādattaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:2867: udakacandrasadṛśā hi sarvadharmā agrāhyatāmupādāya indrāyudharaṅgasadṛśā hi sarvadharmā asatparikalpanatāmupādāya /
S06bsu030_u:2870: tatra suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ evaṃ sarvadharmān samanupaśyan na kaṃciddharmamupaiti nopādatte,
S06bsu030_u:2873: iyaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya sarvadharmaśraddadhānatā anadhiṣṭhānatā anadhyavasānatā anabhiṣvaṅgatā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ /
S06bsu030_u:2874: evaṃ carataḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitābhāvanā paripūriṃ gacchati //
S06bsu030_u:2875: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo na rūpe śikṣate,
S06bsu030_u:2877: na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu /
S06bsu030_u:2878: na vijñāne śikṣate na vijñānasamatikramāya śikṣate /
S06bsu030_u:2881: evaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:2888: evaṃ na vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ saṃkrāntaye śikṣate nāvakrāntaye,
S06bsu030_u:2890: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na rūpanityatāyāṃ śikṣate,
S06bsu030_u:2899: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na rūpātītārambaṇe carati,
S06bsu030_u:2907: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo 'tītaṃ śūnyākāreṇa śāntākāreṇa anātmākāreṇa pratyavekṣate - yadatītaṃ tacchūnyam,
S06bsu030_u:2910: anāgataṃ śūnyākāreṇa śāntākāreṇa anātmākāreṇa pratyavekṣate - yadatītaṃ tacchūnyaṃ śāntamanātmeti /
S06bsu030_u:2912: pratyutpannaṃ śūnyākāreṇa śāntākāreṇa anātmākāreṇa pratyavekṣate - yatpratyutpannaṃ tacchūnyaṃ śāntamanātmeti /
S06bsu030_u:2915: vā anityena vā adhruveṇa vā aśāśvatena vā vipariṇāmadharmiṇā vā,
S06bsu030_u:2917: anāgataṃ śūnyaṃ śāntamanātmanā vā anātmīyena vā anityena vā adhruveṇa vā aśāśvatena vā vipariṇāmadharmiṇā vā,
S06bsu030_u:2919: pratyutpannaṃ śūnyaṃ śāntamanātmanā vā anātmīyena vā anityena vā adhruveṇa vā aśāśvatena vā vipariṇāmadharmiṇā veti,
S06bsu030_u:2921: evaṃ carataḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitābhāvanā paripūriṃ gacchati /
S06bsu030_u:2922: evaṃ carataḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya māraḥ pāpīyānavatāraṃ na labhate /
S06bsu030_u:2925: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin evaṃ caran bodhisattvo na rūpamālambate,
S06bsu030_u:2926: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān,
S06bsu030_u:2969: na hi sarvadharmāṇāṃ kiṃcidgrahaṇaṃ saṃvidyate yatraiṣāmālambanaṃ bhaveta /
S06bsu030_u:2988: tatra suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattva imānādīnavān saṃpaśyan na kaṃciddharmamālambate /
S06bsu030_u:2990: sa nāpyudgrahāya nāgrahāya sthitaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ tāmapi nirālambanavaśikatāṃ na manyate /
S06bsu030_u:2991: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kaṃciddharmamabhiniviśate nābhivadati,
S06bsu030_u:2993: ayaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya sarvadharmālambanavisaṃyogaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ /
S06bsu030_u:2994: evaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya carataḥ prajñāpāramitābhāvanā paripūtiṃ gacchati /
S06bsu030_u:2995: na cāsya māraḥ pāpīyān antarāyaṃ śaknoti kartum,
S06bsu030_u:2999: na cāsya te 'vatāraṃ labhante yatrāsya viheṭhān kuryuḥ,
S06bsu030_u:3007: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na rūpakalpanāyāṃ sthito bhavati na rūpavikalpanāyām /
S06bsu030_u:3008: evaṃ na vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānakalpanāyāṃ sthito bhavati na vikalpanāyām /
S06bsu030_u:3010: evaṃ na vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni kalpayati na vikalpayati /
S06bsu030_u:3035: na pṛthagjanadharmān na śrāvakadharmān na pratyekabuddhadharmān na buddhadharmān kalpayati na vikalpayati /
S06bsu030_u:3036: (Vaidya 57) na pṛthagjanabhūmiṃ na śrāvakabhūmiṃ na pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ na buddhabhūmiṃ kalpayati na vikalpayati /
S06bsu030_u:3041: na muktiṃ na vimuktijñānadarśanaṃ kalpayati na vikalpayati /
S06bsu030_u:3058: , tatra nāsti anto vā madhyaṃ vā /
S06bsu030_u:3059: madhyamiti suvikrāntavikrāmin kalpayataḥ sa evānto bhavati /
S06bsu030_u:3063: yatra punaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin na kalpanā na vikalpanā,
S06bsu030_u:3067: anto hi suvikrāntavikrāmin kalpo vikalpo vikalpasamutthitaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:3079: yo duḥkhaṃ naiva kalpayati na vikalpayati,
S06bsu030_u:3082: sa evaṃ paśyan suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na kaṃciddharmaṃ kalpayati na vikalpayati /
S06bsu030_u:3085: evaṃ carataḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitābhāvanā paripūriṃ gacchati /
S06bsu030_u:3090: mārasya ca pāpīyasaḥ parājayaṃ karoti dhyāmīkaroti ca /
S06bsu030_u:3127: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ ebhiścānyaiśca guṇaiḥ samanvāgato bhavati yeṣāṃ guṇānāṃ na paryantaḥ śakyo 'dhigantum //
S06bsu030_u:3128: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran nendriyavikalo bhavati /
S06bsu030_u:3150: evaṃ ca mārasya pāpīyaso bhavati - atikrāntaviṣayo 'yaṃ mama,
S06bsu030_u:3156: tatra māraḥ pāpīyān śocati krandati paridevate - alpapakṣīkariṣyati ayaṃ bodhisattvo māmiti /
S06bsu030_u:3159: yasmiṃśca samaye suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06bsu030_u:3163: mārāśca pāpīyāṃso duḥkhitā durmanaso bhavanti śokaśalyasamarpitā mahāśokaśalyaviddhāḥ - ativāhayiṣyatyayaṃ bata sattvānasmadviṣayāt,
S06bsu030_u:3174: imamarthavaśaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin saṃpaśyantaste mārā duḥkhitā bhavanti durmanasaḥ śokaśalyaviddhāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:3175: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin puruṣo mahatā dhanaskandhena vipannena duḥkhito vedanātta(rta)
S06bsu030_u:3177: evameva māraḥ pāpīyān duḥkhito bhavati durmanā vipratisārī śokaśalyaviddhaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:3182: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin te mārāḥ pāpīyāṃsaḥ ekataḥ samāgamya cintayanti - kathaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ,
S06bsu030_u:3185: te kathaṃkathāśokaśalyaviddhā bhūtvā upasaṃkrāmanti bodhisattvasyāvatāragaveṣiṇaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ /
S06bsu030_u:3187: na punaḥ kāyasyānyathātvaṃ bhaviṣyati cittasyānyathātvaṃ vā /
S06bsu030_u:3190: tato māraḥ pāpīyānadhiṣṭhito durbalo bhavati līnacitto bhayamāpannaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:3192: tasyaivaṃ bhavati - ahamevāsya na śakto 'vatāraṃ labdhum,
S06bsu030_u:3197: na ca śaknuvanti bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato 'cchaṭāmātramapi cittasya mohanaṃ kartum,
S06bsu030_u:3204: te sarve mahatībhirmāraparṣadbhiḥ sārdhaṃ taṃ bodhisattvaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantamupasaṃkrameyurviheṭhābhiprāyāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:3205: te 'pi sarve suvikrāntavikrāmin mārāḥ pāpīyāṃso na prabhavantyantarāyaṃ kartum /
S06bsu030_u:3207: tathārūpeṇa hi prajñābalādhānena prajñākhaḍgena prajñāśastreṇa tasmin samaye bodhisattvaḥ samanvāgato bhavati /
S06bsu030_u:3208: acintyayā suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñayā aprameyayā asamasamayā bodhisattvastadā samanvāgato bhavati /
S06bsu030_u:3209: tena taṃ na pratibalo bhavati māraḥ pāpīyānabhibhavitum /
S06bsu030_u:3214: ye 'pi tāvatsuvikrāntavikrāmin bāhyā ṛṣayaścaturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ lābhinaḥ,
S06bsu030_u:3216: ye māraviṣayaṃ kāmadhātumatikramya brahmaloke copapadyante caturṣu ca ārūpyeṣu (Vaidya 60)
S06bsu030_u:3221: kaḥ punarvādo mārāṇāṃ pāpīyasāṃ yeṣāmaviṣayo rūparūpyadhātau /
S06bsu030_u:3222: balādhānaprāptaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvastasmin samaye bhavati mahābalādhānasamanvāgato yaduta prajñāpāramitābalena /
S06bsu030_u:3223: ye khalu kecit suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñāpāramitābalena samanvāgatā bhavanti tīkṣṇena prajñāśastreṇa,
S06bsu030_u:3225: ye kecit suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñābalena samanvāgatā bhavanti tīkṣṇena ca prajñāśastreṇa,
S06bsu030_u:3229: niśraye hi suvikrāntavikrāmin sati calitaṃ bhavati,
S06bsu030_u:3232: yeṣāṃ keṣāṃcit suvikrāntavikrāmin niśrayaśca bhavati calitaṃ ca bhavati spanditaṃ ca bhavati prapañcanā (ca)
S06bsu030_u:3233: bhavati, te mārasya pāpīyaso vaśagatā bhavanti,
S06bsu030_u:3235: ye 'pi tāvat suvikrāntavikrāmin yāvad bhavāgropapannāḥ sattvā niśritā niśrayanibaddhā niśrayādhyāsitāḥ,
S06bsu030_u:3240: ye vā punaranye 'pi kecinniśritā ārūpyeṣu niśrayavinibaddhā niśrayādhyāśritāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:3241: bodhisattvastu punaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogamāpadyamānaḥ na kvacinniśrayaṃ karoti,
S06bsu030_u:3243: yasmin khalu punaḥ samaye suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitābhāvanāyogamanuyokto viharati,
S06bsu030_u:3280: sa sarvadharmaiścāniśrito na calati na saṃcalati,
S06bsu030_u:3286: asya niśraya iti nopalabhate na manyate,
S06bsu030_u:3288: sarvaniśrayānamanyamāno 'nupalabhamāno 'nabhiniviśamānaḥ na kvacinniśrayamupaiti nopadiśati nābhinandati nādhyavasāya tiṣṭhati /
S06bsu030_u:3290: idaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya sarvadharmaniśrayaviśuddhijñānadarśanaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ,
S06bsu030_u:3299: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattva ādita eva anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāvutpanne citte bahukuśalamūlasaṃbhārasamudāgataśca bhavati,
S06bsu030_u:3312: so 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādya prajñāpāramitāyāmabhiyukto mārān pāpīyaso 'dhitiṣṭhati tena prajñābalena ca - yathā me mārāḥ pāpīyāṃso 'vatāraṃ na labheran,
S06bsu030_u:3316: nāpi cittamutpādayanti - kimiti vayamasya bodhisattvasya avatāraṃ gaveṣāmahe,
S06bsu030_u:3321: saṃvignāśca bhavanti - mā vayaṃ sarveṇa sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyāma iti /
S06bsu030_u:3324: anenāpi suvikrāntavikrāmin paryāyeṇa bodhisattvasya mārāḥ pāpīyāṃso 'ntarāyāya prayupasthitā avatāraṃ na labhante //
S06bsu030_u:3325_0: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ
S06bsu030_u:3325_1: deśyamānāyāṃ chandaśca adhyāśayaśca gauravaṃ va citrīkāraśca śāstṛsaṃjñā ca utpāditā bhavati /
S06bsu030_u:3326: na ca ṣaṭpāramitāsaṃyuktāyāṃ kathāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā utpāditā bhavati,
S06bsu030_u:3327: nāpi gambhāīrān dharmān śrutvā kāṅkṣāyitatvaṃ vā dhandhāyitatvaṃ vā vicikitsāyitatvaṃ vā utpāditaṃ bhavati,
S06bsu030_u:3330: anye ca bahavaḥ sattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ samādāpitā bhavanti,
