S06bsu030_u:3332: tasya pūrvāśayacittaviśuddhitayā pūrvāśayāsaṃkliṣṭatayā na mārāḥ pāpīyāṃso 'ntarāyāya pratyupasthitā bhavanti,
S06bsu030_u:3337: anenāpi suvikrāntavikrāmin paryāyeṇa bodhisattvasya mārāḥ pāpīyāṃso na viheṭhāya pratyupasthitā bhavanti //
S06bsu030_u:3338: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rūpayoganimitte carati,
S06bsu030_u:3350: carati, na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānaviśuddhinimitte carati /
S06bsu030_u:3353: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānārambaṇaviśuddhinimitte carati,
S06bsu030_u:3354: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānārambaṇaviśuddhyanimitte carati /
S06bsu030_u:3357: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānasaṃbhavaviśuddhisaṃyoge carati,
S06bsu030_u:3361: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānārambaṇasvabhāvaviśuddhisaṃyoge carati,
S06bsu030_u:3364: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānaprakṛtiviśuddhau carati /
S06bsu030_u:3367: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānārambaṇaprakṛtiviśuddhivisaṃyoge carati /
S06bsu030_u:3369: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānātītānāgatapratyutpannaviśuddhau carati /
S06bsu030_u:3371: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānārambaṇātītānāgatapratyutpannaviśuddhau carati /
S06bsu030_u:3374: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānātītānāgatapratyutpannaviśuddhisaṃyoge carati,
S06bsu030_u:3375: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānātītānāgatapratyutpannaviśuddhivisaṃyoge carati /
S06bsu030_u:3377: na rūpārambaṇātītānāgatapratyutpannaviśuddhivisaṃyoge na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānārambaṇātītānāgatapratyutpannaviśuddhisaṃyoge carati,
S06bsu030_u:3378: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānārambaṇātītānāgatapratyutpannaviśuddhivisaṃyoge carati /
S06bsu030_u:3379: evaṃ caran na rūpeṇa saṃyujyate na visaṃyujyate /
S06bsu030_u:3390: na pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ saṃyujyate na visaṃyujyate /
S06bsu030_u:3415: sarvadharmā hi suvikrāntavikrāmin na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:3417: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin sarvadharmāḥ saṃyogena pratyupasthitā na visaṃyogena /
S06bsu030_u:3420: sarvadharmāṇāṃ hi suvikrāntavikrāmin na kaścidavabodhaḥ yena saṃyujyeran vā visaṃyujyeran vā /
S06bsu030_u:3421: sarvadharmāṇāṃ hi suvikrāntavikrāmin na kaścitsaṃyogāya pratyupasthito na visaṃyogāya /
S06bsu030_u:3422: sacet suvikrāntavikrāmin dharmāṇāṃ kaścitsaṃyojayitā vā visaṃyojayitā vā abhaviṣyat,
S06bsu030_u:3429: prajñāpayettathāgataḥ - ayamasau dharmāṇāṃ kārako vā kārayitā vā,
S06bsu030_u:3435: yasmāttarhi vikrāntavikrāmin sarvadharmāṇāṃ na kaścitsaṃyogāya pratyupasthito na visaṃyogāya,
S06bsu030_u:3436: tasmānna kaściddharmāṇāṃ kārako vā kārayitā vā,
S06bsu030_u:3444: na ca viparyāsaḥ kenacitsaṃyukto vā visaṃyukto vā /
S06bsu030_u:3451: na cātra kaściddharma upalabhyate yo 'sau viparyāsa ityucyeta /
S06bsu030_u:3452: viparyāsa iti suvikrāntavikrāmin vipratilambha eṣa sattvānām,
S06bsu030_u:3456: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin bāladārako riktena muṣṭinollāpitaḥ saṃjānāti bhūtamiti,
S06bsu030_u:3457: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin bālapṛthagjanā ucchedena viparyāsenollāpitā mūḍhā evaṃ manyante - bhūtametaditi /
S06bsu030_u:3458: te abhūte bhūtasaṃjñino viparyāsagrastā durmocyā bhavanti tasmādviparyāsāt /
S06bsu030_u:3459: evaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin sarvabālapṛthagjanā asaṃyuktā avisaṃyuktā bandhanabaddhāḥ saṃdhāvanti /
S06bsu030_u:3466: yaḥ punaḥ saṃyogaṃ nopalabhate na manyate nābhiniviśate,
S06bsu030_u:3469: sacedvisaṃyogaṃ manyeta vā upalabheta vā abhiniviśeta vā,
S06bsu030_u:3471: tatra suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattva imamarthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyan na kenaciddharmeṇa saṃyujyate na visaṃyujyate,
S06bsu030_u:3472: nāpi kasyaciddharmasya saṃyogāya pratyupasthito bhavati na visaṃyogāya /
S06bsu030_u:3473: iyaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya saṃyogavisaṃyogaparijñā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ /
S06bsu030_u:3474: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ kṣipraṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ pāramadhigacchati //
S06bsu030_u:3475: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rūpāsaṅgatāyāṃ carati,
S06bsu030_u:3476: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānāsaṅgatāyāṃ carati /
S06bsu030_u:3478: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānasaṅgaviśuddhau carati /
S06bsu030_u:3480: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānāsaṅgārambaṇe carati /
S06bsu030_u:3483: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānāsaṅgatāsaṃyoge carati,
S06bsu030_u:3487: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānāsaṅgatāviśuddhisaṃyoge carati,
S06bsu030_u:3491: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānārambaṇaviśuddhisaṃyoge carati,
S06bsu030_u:3494: sarvāṇi hyetāni suvikrāntavikrāmin na iñjitāni nimittāni spanditāni caritāni vicaritāni bodhisattvena parijñātāni /
S06bsu030_u:3496: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rūpātītānāgatapratyutpannasaṅgatāyāṃ carati,
S06bsu030_u:3498: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānātītānāgatapratyutpannasaṅgatāyāṃ carati,
S06bsu030_u:3502: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānātītānāgatapratyutpannaviśuddhau carati,
S06bsu030_u:3506: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānātītānāgatapratyutpannāsaṅgārambaṇaviśuddhau carati,
S06bsu030_u:3509: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃścaryāṃ samanupaśyati /
S06bsu030_u:3512: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ kṣipraṃ sarvajñatādharmaparipūrimadhigacchati //
S06bsu030_u:3514: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rūpaṃ vivṛtamiti carati,
S06bsu030_u:3516: na vedanā va saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:3521: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:3526: na vedanā va saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:3530: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:3532: na rūpamatītānāgatapratyutpannaṃ prakṛtiviviktaṃ vā prakṛtiśāntaṃ vā carati /
S06bsu030_u:3533: na rūpamatītānāgatapratyutpannaṃ prakṛtyaviviktaṃ cā prakṛtyaśāntaṃ vā carati /
S06bsu030_u:3534: na vedanā na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:3535: na vijñānamatītānāgatapratyuatpannaṃ prakṛtiviviktaṃ vā prakṛtiśāntaṃ vā carati,
S06bsu030_u:3536: na vijñānamatītānāgatapratyutpannaṃ prakṛtiviviktaṃ vā prakṛttiśāntaṃ vā carati /
S06bsu030_u:3537: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ kṣipraṃ sarvajñatādharmaparipūrimadhigacchati //
S06bsu030_u:3538: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpaṃ na manyate /
S06bsu030_u:3539: evaṃ na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān /
S06bsu030_u:3556: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ kṣipraṃ sarvajñatādharmaparipūriṃ gacchati /
S06bsu030_u:3557: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattva āsanno bhavati daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānām,
S06bsu030_u:3561: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattva āsanno dvātriṃśatāṃ mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇanām /
S06bsu030_u:3569: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ kṣipraṃ sarvabuddhadharmaparipūrimadhigacchati /
S06bsu030_u:3570: (Vaidya 67) evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ kṣipraṃ buddhakṣetrapariśuddhimadhigacchati /
S06bsu030_u:3572: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na rūpe pratiṣṭhate,
S06bsu030_u:3608: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin sarvadharmāṇāṃ pratiṣṭhānaṃ vidyate /
S06bsu030_u:3613: ālayo vā kūṭastho vā dharmāṇāmabhaviṣyat, ni(nya?)
S06bsu030_u:3614: darśayiṣyattathāgato dharmāṇāṃ pratiṣṭhānam - idaṃ dharmāṇāṃ pratiṣṭhānam,
S06bsu030_u:3617: yasmāttarhi suvikrāntavikrāmin sarvadharmā apratiṣṭhitāḥ anālayāḥ asaṃcayāḥ,
S06bsu030_u:3619: tasmāttathāgato dharmāṇāṃ pratiṣṭhānaṃ vā ālayaṃ vā saṃcayaṃ vā na nirdiśati /
S06bsu030_u:3626: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin catasṛṇāṃ mahānadīnāmanavataptāt sarasaḥ prasravantīnāṃ nāstyadhiṣṭhānamanyatra mahāsamudrāt,
S06bsu030_u:3629: anabhisaṃskāra iti suvikrāntavikrāmin na tatra sthānaṃ nāsthānaṃ nādhiṣṭhānam,
S06bsu030_u:3631: sthānamiti vā adhiṣṭhānamiti vā asthānamiti vā abhisaṃskāra iti suvikrāntavikrāmin gaṇanaiṣā nirdiṣṭā /
S06bsu030_u:3637: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ kṣipraṃ sarvajñadharmān paripūrayati,
S06bsu030_u:3643: tasmāttarhi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvena mahāsattvena arthaṃ kartukāmena,
S06bsu030_u:3664: dharmacakraṃ pravartayitukāmena apravartitapūrvaṃ śramaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā māreṇa vā brahmaṇā vā anyena vā punaḥ kenacillokena sahadharmeṇa,
S06bsu030_u:3669: sarvasattvānāṃ pūrvapraṇidhānakuśalamūlāni saṃcodayitukāmena asyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ ghaṭitavyaṃ vyāyacchitavyaṃ prajñāpāramitābhāvanāyogamanuyuktena bhavitavyam /
S06bsu030_u:3670_0: nāhaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya kaṃciddharmamevaṃ kṣipraṃ paripūrikaraṃ samanupaśyāmi
S06bsu030_u:3670_1: sarvadharmāṇāṃ yatheha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yathānirdiṣṭāyāmabhiyogaḥ pratipattiḥ asya
S06bsu030_u:3671: ye kecitsuvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvā asyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti,
S06bsu030_u:3672: niṣṭhā tatra gantavyā - āsannā ime bodhisattvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiviti /
S06bsu030_u:3673: yeṣāṃ keṣāṃcit suvikrāntavikrāmin iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā śrotrāvabhāsamapyāgamiṣyati,
S06bsu030_u:3676: teṣāmapyahaṃ kuśalamūlamanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherāhārakaṃ vadāmi - niṣṭhā ca tatra gantavyā - mahāprajñāsaṃbhāropacitā hyete kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā,
S06bsu030_u:3678: yeṣāṃ ca suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvānāmayaṃ prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyaparivartanirdeśo hastaṃ gamiṣyati,
S06bsu030_u:3679: kiṃcāpi tatra kecinna vyākṛtā bhaviṣyanti saṃmukhaṃ buddhairbhagavadbhiḥ,
S06bsu030_u:3680: atha ca punarveditavyametat - āsannā hyete vyākaraṇasya,
S06bsu030_u:3683: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin ye sattvā daśakuśalān karmapathān samādāya vartante,
S06bsu030_u:3684: niṣṭhā tatra gantavyā - āsannā hyete sattvā uttarakuruṣūpapatteḥ /
S06bsu030_u:3685: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin yasya kasyacidbodhisattvasya iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā hasyaṃ gamiṣyati,
S06bsu030_u:3687: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin ye sattvā dānaṃ prayacchanti muktatyāgāśca bhavanti,
S06bsu030_u:3688: sattvāṃśca dānena priyavadyatayā arthacaryayā samānārthatayā ca saṃgṛhṇanti,
S06bsu030_u:3691: niṣṭhā tatra gantavyā - kṣipramime sattvā mahābhogā bhavantyuccakulīnāśca //
S06bsu030_u:3692: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin ye sattvā dānaśīlāśca bhavanti śīlasaṃpannāśca bhavanti,
S06bsu030_u:3699: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin yasya kasyacidbodhisattvasya iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā hastagatā bhaviṣyati,
S06bsu030_u:3701: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin yasya rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya pūrṇāyāṃ pūrṇamāsyāṃ pañcadaśyāṃ purato 'rthakaraṇe saṃniṣaṇṇasya cakraratnaṃ prādurbhavati,
S06bsu030_u:3704: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin yasya bodhisattvasya ayaṃ prajñāpāramitāparivarto hastaṃ gamiṣyati,
S06bsu030_u:3706: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin ye sattvā utkṛṣṭakuśalamūlasamanvāgatāśca bhaviṣyanti śobhanasamācārāśca bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu030_u:3714: ye kecitsuvikrāntavikrāmin pariśuddhataraiḥ kuśalamūlaiḥ samanvāgatā utkṛṣṭakuśalamūlāśca pūrvaṃ ca dāna dadati paścātsvayaṃ bhuñjate,
S06bsu030_u:3715: prāk cānyeṣāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛtyāni kurvanti paścādātmanaḥ,
S06bsu030_u:3719: veditavyametat - acirādete aprakampyaṃ devānāṃ trāyastriṃśatāmaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ kariṣyanti,
S06bsu030_u:3721: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin yasya kasyacidbodhisattvasya iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā upanaṃsyate,
S06bsu030_u:3723: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin ye sattvāścaturṇāṃ brahmavihārāṇāṃ lābhino bhavanti,
S06bsu030_u:3728: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin vārṣikeṣu māseṣu pratyupasthiteṣu iyaṃ mahāpṛthivī meghān pratītya snigdhā bhavati,
S06bsu030_u:3733: evamiyaṃ mahāpṛthivī abhyantarā ca abhiṣyanditā snigdhā ca bhavati,
S06bsu030_u:3737: te 'bhiṣyanditāḥ santo bahūn śākhāpatrapalāśān muñcanti bahupuṣpaphalāśca bhavanti,
S06bsu030_u:3739: evamiyaṃ mahāpṛthivī puṣpaphalotsasarastaḍāgaistasmin samaye upaśobhitā bhavati /
S06bsu030_u:3740: tataśca tuṣṭā bhavanti manuṣyāśca amanuṣyāśca tāni puṣpaphalāni paribhuñjamānāstaṃ ca gandhaṃ jighrantaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:3741: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin yadā bodhisattvasya iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā abhimukhī bhavati,
S06bsu030_u:3747: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin ye 'navataptasya nāgarājasya bhavane sattvā upapannāḥ,
S06bsu030_u:3748: te catvāro mahānadīrutsṛjati yā mahāsamudraṃ saṃtarpayanti /
S06bsu030_u:3749: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin yeṣāṃ bodhisattvānāmiyaṃ prajñāpāramitā hastamupanaṃsyati,
S06bsu030_u:3753: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin ye kecitsattvāḥ sumeroḥ parvatarājasyāntikamupasaṃkrāmanti,
S06bsu030_u:3754: sarve te ekavarṇā bhavanti yaduta suvarṇavarṇā bhavanti /
S06bsu030_u:3755: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin yeṣāṃ bodhisattvānāmayaṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśo hastagato bhaviṣyati,
S06bsu030_u:3756: sarve te ekāṃ gatiṃ gamiṣyanti yaduta tathāgatagatiṃ sarvajñatāgatim //
S06bsu030_u:3757: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin sāgaro mahāsamudraḥ sarvodakasaṃdhārayitā,
S06bsu030_u:3759: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin yasya kasyacidbodhisattvasya ayaṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśo hastagato bhaviṣyati,
S06bsu030_u:3760: niṣṭhā tatra gantavyā - kṣipramayaṃ sarvadharmasāgaratāṃ sarvadharmabhājanatāṃ sarvadharmasamavasaraṇatāmanuprāpsyati,
S06bsu030_u:3762: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin sūryamaṇḍalamabhyudgacchat sarvā diśaḥ prabhādhyāmīkaroti,
S06bsu030_u:3763: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo 'syāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvasattvānāṃ dharmāvabhāsakṛtyena pratyutpasthito bhavati,
S06bsu030_u:3770: asyāṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo 'gratāyāṃ śikṣate,
S06bsu030_u:3773: eṣā hi suvikrāntavikrāmin agrā śikṣā jyeṣṭhā varā pravarā anuttarā niruttarā yeyaṃ prajñāpāramitāśikṣā /
S06bsu030_u:3774: asyāṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ sarvaśikṣāpāramitāṃ prāpnoti,
S06bsu030_u:3778: asyāṃ hi suvikrāntavikrāmin śikṣāyāmatītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā bhagavanto bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ carantaḥ śikṣitāḥ śikṣiṣyante śikṣante ca /
S06bsu030_u:3779: asyāṃ ca śikṣāyāṃ supratiṣṭhitā buddhā bhagavantaḥ sarvasattvebhyo 'nuttarāṃ śikṣāpariśuddhiṃ saṃprakāśitavantaḥ,
S06bsu030_u:3784: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na kasmiṃściddharme śikṣito bhavati laukike vā lokottare vā,
S06bsu030_u:3791: sarvadharmā hi suvikrāntavikrāmin asaktā abaddhā amuktāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:3792: nāpi kasyaciddharmasya saṅgena pratyupasthitā na bandhanena /
S06bsu030_u:3822: asaktā iti suvikrāntavikrāmin na teṣāṃ kaścinmocayitā,
S06bsu030_u:3830: yataśca nopalabhyate yaḥ saṃyujyate vā badhyeta vā,
S06bsu030_u:3846: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattva āsanno bhavatyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
S06bsu030_u:3848: imāmahaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin mudrāṃ sthāpayāmi bodhisattvānāṃ saṃśayacchedāya prajñāpāramitāmabhiyuktānāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratām /
S06bsu030_u:3850: na pratibalā mama śrāvakā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudrāṃ paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ dhārayitum //
S06bsu030_u:3851_0: atha khalu bhagavān bhadrapālasusārthavāhapūrvaṃgamāni pañcamātrāṇi bodhisattvaśatānyāmantrayate
S06bsu030_u:3851_1: sma suvikrāntavikrāmiṇaṃ ca bodhisattvam - śakyatha yūyaṃ kulaputrāstathāgate parinirvṛte
S06bsu030_u:3851_2: paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimikāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ saddharmāntardhānakālasamaye
S06bsu030_u:3853: evamukte bodhisattvā bhagavantametadavocat - śakyāmo vayaṃ bhagavan imaṃ tathāgatasya anekakalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrasamudānītamanuttaraṃ
S06bsu030_u:3856: kiṃcāpi bhagavan sa kālo mahābhayo mahākāntāro mahāghoraśca bhaviṣyati,
S06bsu030_u:3857: yadbhūyasā ca tasmin samaye sattvāḥ saddharmavyavanasaṃvartanīyena karmaṇā samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu030_u:3858_1: paruṣāḥ durvacasaḥ śaṭhāḥ kuhakā māyāvino 'dharmacāriṇaḥ kalahabhaṇḍanavivādavigrahabahulā
S06bsu030_u:3858_2: asaṃvarasthitāḥ lubdhā lobhābhibhūtāḥ kusīdāḥ hīnavīryā muṣitasmṛtayo 'saṃprajñāstuṇḍāḥ
S06bsu030_u:3859: asya gambhīrasya dharmavinayasya dharmaratnakoṣasya apratyudgatamanaḥśīlāśca bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu030_u:3860: atha ca punarutsahāmahe vayaṃ bhagavan imaṃ tathāgatasya anekakalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrakuśalamūlasamudānītamanuttaraṃ dharmaratnakoṣaṃ dhārayituṃ vācayitum,
S06bsu030_u:3873: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmidaṃ dharmādhiṣṭhānaṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśamadhitiṣṭhiti sma,
S06bsu030_u:3874: mārasya ca pāpīyaso 'smin dharmaparyāye mārapāśānāṃ chedāya adhiṣṭhānamakarot /
S06bsu030_u:3875: atha khalu bhagavān smitaṃ prāviṣkaroti sma,
S06bsu030_u:3882: mahāntaṃ ca nirnādanirghoṣamakārṣuḥ - mahādhiṣṭhānaṃ batedaṃ tathāgatenādhiṣṭhitaṃ yatrāgatirmārāṇāṃ pāpīyasām /
S06bsu030_u:3883: sarvamārapāśa hi cchinnā anena dharmādhiṣṭhānena ca /
S06bsu030_u:3884: teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca bhūyo mārebhyaḥ pāpīyobhyo 'bhayaṃ pratikāṅkṣitavyam /
S06bsu030_u:3885: ye imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti parebhyaśca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyanti,
S06bsu030_u:3887: māraṃ ca te pāpīyāṃsaṃ sasainyaṃ parājayiṣyanti ye imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayiṣyanti,
S06bsu030_u:3889: atha khalu bhagavān suvikrāntavikrāmiṇaṃ bodhisattvametadavocat - evametatsuvikrāntavikrāmin,
S06bsu030_u:3892: baddhasīmā suvikrāntavikrāmin mārāṇāṃ pāpīyasāmasmin dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe tathāgatena /
S06bsu030_u:3893: ye 'tra khalu punaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā imaṃ dharmaparyāyamudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti,
S06bsu030_u:3896: anākramaṇīyāśca te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraśca bhaviṣyanti māraiḥ pāpīyobhiḥ /
S06bsu030_u:3900: na khalu punaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin ayaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ saṃkliṣṭānāṃ sattvānāṃ hastaṃ gamiṣyati,
S06bsu030_u:3904: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin ye te bhaviṣyanti hastyājāneyā vā aśvājāneyā vā,
S06bsu030_u:3910: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin manuṣyājāneyānāṃ sattvānāmime evaṃrūpā dharmaparyāyāḥ paribhogāya hastaṃ gamiṣyanti /
S06bsu030_u:3912: upoṣadho nāgarājaḥ supratiṣṭhitaśca nāgarājaḥ airāvaṇo nāgarājaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:3915: nāpi te anyeṣāṃ devānāmupabhogāya paribhogāya saṃkrāmanti,
S06bsu030_u:3917: yathā yathā ca śakro devānāmindro 'bhikrāmati vyūhaṃ kṛtvā,
S06bsu030_u:3918: tathā tathā cāpi nāgarājānastādṛśameva vyūhaṃ kṛtvā upasaṃkrāmanti paribhogāya /
S06bsu030_u:3919: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin ye te bhaviṣyanti manuṣyendrāḥ puruṣendrāḥ teṣāmime dharmaparyāyā upabhogaparibhogāya bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu030_u:3921: teṣāṃ ceme dharmaparyāyā mahāvyūhā mahāviṣkārā mahādharmālokā bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu030_u:3924: asya dharmaparyāyasya ekaṃ nayaṃ ye dhārayiṣyanti,
S06bsu030_u:3925: kaḥ punarvādo ye sakalasamāptaṃ lekhayitvā dhārayiṣyanti pūjayiṣyanti vaistārikaṃ ca kariṣyanti,
S06bsu030_u:3927: parigṛhītāste khalu punaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin anena dharmaparyāyeṇa bhaviṣyanti /
S06bsu030_u:3930: asmin khalu punardharmaparyāye bhagavatā bhāṣyamāṇe anekairaprameyairbodhisattvairanutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ pratilabdhābhūt /
S06bsu030_u:3932: niyatāśca te tathāgatena nirdiṣṭā abhūvan bodhāya //
S06bsu030_u:3943: sarvākāramidaṃ vadanti munayo viśvaṃ yayā saṃgatās
S06bsu030_u:3945: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat /
S06bsu030_u:3946: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodho evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ // 2 //
